177b7('dul ba): kyi rnam par smin pas/ nga lo dang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang po rnams sems can dmyal ba rnam su bcos// las
177b8('dul ba): lhag ma de kho nas da ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang nga'i skal tshigs rlung nad kyis thebs par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa
178a1('dul ba): rnams dang zhes bya ba nas/ btsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta phul bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma banan/ 
178a2('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi// bam po drug pa/ thams cad zil gnon thams cad gzigs// thub pa 'jig rten kun la sman// sreng pa thams cad zag pa bzlas// sbyor ba kun gyis
178a3('dul ba): phyin mdzad// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad rig/ thub chen thams cad mngon par mkhyen// 'khon dang 'jigs pa kun las 'das// chom kun gyi ni pa rol gshegs/ 
178a4('dul ba): bsam pa kun la mkhas pa po// sred pa thams cad rab tu bcom// sems can kun la phan dgongs pa// mdung pa thams cad rab tu grol// bag la nyang kun bcad nas ni
178a5('dul ba): 'ching nga thams cad yang dag bcad// sems can kun gyi mchog rab ste// thub pa chos rnams ston par mdzad// sems dpa' chen po shes rab che// brtson
178a6('dul ba): 'grus chen po grags pa che// chos chen 'odan chen pa pa// chos chen don gyi pha rom gshegs// klu chen sang+ge chen po pa// dge slong chen po drang srong che// shes rab chen
178a7('dul ba): ral gri mtshon// nyon mongs chen po rab tu bcom// stobs dang brtson 'grus rab tu che// brtan pa chen po pha rol gnon// byang chub chen po brnyas pa gang // dgra chen rnams
178a8('dul ba): las rnam par rgyal// nang chen po yi dpyad mdzad pas// bcom ldan sman pa chen po lags// 'dod chags chen zil gnon la// sman chen po ni stsol ba po// 'khor ba chen po
178b1('dul ba): brtson ran// 'ching ba chen pos bcings rnams la// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// 'ching ba kun las grol bar mdzad// skyes bu chen po lha chen po// tshogs rnams
178b2('dul ba): kyi ni tshogs chen ldan// sbyin pa'i mchog ni sprin chen po// zhi ba chen po go 'phang reg/ sems can mchog ste drang srong mchog/ de bzhin rnam par 'dren mchog brnyas/ 
178b3('dul ba): nyan thos mchog ni phun sum tshogs// chos kyi mchog ni rab ston pa// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i mchog/ yon gnas rnams kyi mchog tu 'os// rnam par grol
178b4('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog/ mtshan ni mchog rab kun dang lnga na// bcom ldan srid las rab tu grol// srid pa'i da ga' ba las 'phags pa// srid pa'i 'dod chags kun
178b5('dul ba): nas bcad // srid pa'i sred pa rab tu bcom// chos chen po ni bsgoms pas ni// 'jigs dang 'jigasu rung ba spangs// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyi gnas// mtha
178b6('dul ba): yi mtsho chen du// thams cad bya ba byas pa yi// nyan thos rnams kyis mdun byas te// lnga brgya rnams dang thams gcig tu// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la gshegs/ 
178b7('dul ba): chu bo de yi 'bram dag tu// smra ba'i mchog ni bzhugs nas ni// rjesu brtse ba thugs rje can// lus can kun la phan mdzad pas// mchil gzigs nas dge slong la/ 
178b8('dul ba): 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to// ngas ni sdig pa gang byas dang // nga yi tshig 'di mnyan par gyis// ngas ni sngon gyi tshe rab su// g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gyur// rang sangs rgyas
179a1('dul ba): ni legs smon te// skyon med la ni skur pa btab// skye bo'i tshogs chen lhags nas// thub pa chos kyi yon tan dga'// bcing padam pos de btsa
179a2('dul ba): nas grong khyer nas ni phyung ba dang / dge sbyong bcing bas dam bcing nas// sdug bsngal gyur te nga yis mthong // de la snying rje bskyed nas kyang // nga nyid kyis ni thar par byas// wa
179a3('dul ba): kyi rnam par smin pa ngas// dmyal ba rnams yun ris 'phangs// slar yang mi ni 'ongs pa na// ngas ni skur pa thob par gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas kyang // nga yi yang srang
179a4('dul ba): tha ma la// mu stegs rnams kyis mdzes ma'i phyir// yang dag ma yin skur pa btab// nga sngon bram zer gyur pa ni// gsang tshig 'dzin cing mang thos pa// bram ze
179a5('dul ba): brgya rnams la na// tshal na gsang tshig brjod pa'i tshe// mngon shes lnga ldan rdzu 'phrul che// byin chen drang srong der 'ongs pa// bkur bsti byed pa ngas mthong nas/ 
179a6('dul ba): skyon med la ni skur pa btab// drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ces// ngas ni bram ze'i khye'u la smros// bramo ze'i khye'u rnams nga yi tshig/ thos nas rje su yi rang zhing // de nas bram
179a7('dul ba): ze'i khye'u rnams kyis// khyim dang khyim du skyong ba ni// drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ces// skye bo mang po dag la smras// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dge slong lnga brgya dag dang la
179a8('dul ba): mdzes ma khana'i rgyu las ni// skur pa dag ni thob par gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon gyi// nyan thos gyur pa gnas 'jig pu// de tsha dag spyod de la ni// sa na
179b1('dul ba): mi bden skur pa btab// sdig pa'i las de byas pas na// mi bzad ngan 'gror song nas ni// sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skyes// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyam su myong // de nas lnga
179b2('dul ba): kyi lhag mes ni// nga la bram ze rtsa mis 'dir// skye ba'i tsho gas ni 'dus pa na// yang dag ma yin skur pa btab// nor gyi phyir ni skyon med par// ngas ni g.yas khyim nu bo
179b3('dul ba): ni/ ri yigs pa tu bcug nasu// ngas ni rdo ba dag gis bsnun// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba dag tu yun rings 'phangs// rab tu tsha dang thig nagi/ sdug bsgral
179b4('dul ba): cher brkyong bar gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// g+ha sbyin gyis ni rdo pa sa te// nga la zhabs kyi mtho ban// rdo ba'i dum bras rma yang phyung // rgya mtsho yin
179b5('dul ba): bo ches// rgya mchi la ni 'gro ba ni// grun 'dug pa'i tshang pa ni// mdung thung rnon pos bsad par gyur// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba rnams su
179b6('dul ba): yun rings 'phangs// de yi las kyi lhag mas nga'i// zhabs la tshal pa bzug par gyur// sngon ni nya pa'i grong khyer gyi// nya pa'i bur ni gyur pa na// nya rnams bsod par
179b7('dul ba): byed pa dang // yid dga' ba ni skyes par gyur// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// nga ni dmyal bar yun riris 'phangs// rab tu tsha dang thag nag dang // sdug bsngal mang po mang
179b8('dul ba): bar gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// gang gi tshe na 'phags skyes po// shAkya rnams ni gsod pa na// klad pa mi bzang nad kyis thebs// rnam par gzigs kyi gsung
180a1('dul ba): rab kyi/ nyan thos yongs smad byas te// khyed ni nas dag za bar 'ong // khyed la 'bras ni mi rigs shes// ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang // las kyi rnam
180a2('dul ba): par smin pa des// dmyal ba'i thig nag rnams ni// sdug bsngal mang po nyamasu myong // de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// dgra mthar dbyar ni gnas btsas te// bram ze yis ni
180a3('dul ba): spyan drangs che// zla bo gsum du nas dag zos// nga ni smin par gyur pa na// tshong dpon bu po 'khrur 'jug cha// nad kyis sdug bsngal gyur pa la// sman ma yin pa ngas byi ro// 
180a4('dul ba): kyi rnam par smin pa des// sdug bsngal mang po nyam su kyi // de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// de 'dra'i 'khru ba'i nad kyis thibs// sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams// 
180a5('dul ba): mthu can kyang gyur che// stobs dag 'gyed par byed pa na// ngas ni gyad kyi bu zhig bsadang // las kyi rnam pa/ ra smin pa ngas// sdug bsngal mang po thams myong // ngam
180a6('dul ba): las kyi lhag mas ni// 'di na nga yi rgyabastung // sngon ni ngan spong bur gyur pa// dga' skyeng la ni smras pa ni// mgo reg ngas mthang ci zhig bya// 'di la byang chub yid ra yin/ 
180a7('dul ba): ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang // las kyi rnam par smin pa des// 'dir yang mir ni 'ongs po na// khyim med par ni rang byung nas// byang chub mchog ni 'dod pa'i phyir// ltung
180a8('dul ba): 'gram du lo drug tu// mchog tu dka' ba spyad pa ngas// sdug bsngal mang po nyam su myong // sems can kun gyi rab mchog gis chos kyi dam pa thugs chung nas// sdig
180b1('dul ba): nga'i las ni gang mdzad pa// tshogs kyi mchog la bka' stsal to// thams cad zil gnon stobs brnyes kyis// dge slong dge 'dun phung bzhugs nas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen
180b2('dul ba): du/ nyid kyi phrin las lung bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u'o// sdom ni/ gnas 'dzag sbyasbrang rtsi can dang ni// rgyu can ko'u di n+ya nye bar 'khor// 'od
180b3('dul ba): byed dang ni nam gru ste// phyi ma bde bar gshegs pa ni// ma dros pa'i tshigasu bcad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thags gcig tu/ mtsho chen po ma
180b4('dul ba): dris par phrin las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan nas/ ma dros pa nas mi snang bar mdzad/ mnyan yod kyi ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzangs na bzhug so// raM
180b5('dul ba): rags 'dzin gyi mas gis// bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ mnyan yod gshegs nas/ mnyan yod kyi bdag gi khang
180b6('dul ba): bzangs kho na na bzhug so zhes thos// thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu dga' bar mdzad ras cang mi gsung
180b7('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyi mas gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
180b8('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros par/ rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa'i dgra bcom pa lnga brgya gang dag lags pa dang thabs gcig tu
181a1('dul ba): sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sags gnang bar rig
181a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gru bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ stan ches dpa' ba zhig blang
181a3('dul ba): nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dab
181a4('dul ba): bstan yang dag par 'dzin du gtsug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas/ bcu
181a5('dul ba): lag khang du byin pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bkas
181a6('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma se ga la mi rdzogs par yod/ des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te gdugs chod gsol na/ 'on kyang dge 'dun gyi ched du
181a7('dul ba): yin phu lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa lar ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ grong khyer thigs pa can du byon nas/ grong khyer thigs pa can gyi byed phyogs kyi gro
181a8('dul ba): khyer shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhug so// grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kau sa la nas zhes bya ba nas shing sha pal
181b1('dul ba): tshal na bzhugaso zhes thoso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas khyur phrad cing 'dus te/ grong khyer thigs pa can nas byung nas/ 
181b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ 
181b3('dul ba): cang mi gsung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs
181b4('dul ba): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag sdum par gdugs chad
181b5('dul ba): zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis phreng khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gar // 
181b6('dul ba): de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas gnyis
181b7('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong // de nas yi dwags rus gong sbrel ba bsgreng ba lta bu/ rang gi skras yog pa lto ro tsam/ kha khab kyi mig tsam/ 
181b8('dul ba): 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ ma lce gcig tu gyur pa lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das gang na ba~M der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la kun nas
182a1('dul ba): su bskor te/ 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'di dag ni bdag cag gi ce
182a2('dul ba): gyur pa lags na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag cag kho na'i ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
182a3('dul ba): pa~M/ ngas ngam zhig bcas te/ gal te khyed cag cha byad 'di nyid kyis yon sde ba byed pa'i tshe 'od na ni/ khyed cig ming nas yon bsngo ba byar// de rnams kyis gsol
182a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das g.yar tsha lags na/ ji ltar mchi lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe che gsu bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ ngo tsha med la ngo tsha byed
182a5('dul ba): ngo tsha ba la ngo mtsha/ 'jigs pa med la 'jigs par lta/ 'jigs pa la ni mi 'jigs lta/ log pa'i lta ba blangs pas na// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ 
182a6('dul ba): ngo tsha ba la ngo tsha dang / ngo tsha med la ngo mo tsha// mi 'jigs pa la mi 'jigs lta// 'jig pa la ni 'jigs lta ba'i// yang dag lta ba blangs pa yis// sems can rnams ni bde
182a7('dul ba): 'gror 'gro// de rnams kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar na mchi lag so// de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ 
182a8('dul ba): kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' bdag sta gan byas nas zhes bya ba na/ stan tshes dpa' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
182b1('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar 'dago zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yi dwags lnga brgya po de dag 'ongs pa dang / de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ 
182b2('dul ba): dwags rnams mthong nas 'bros par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bac+doMs ying
182b3('dul ba): 'o ni dag mchi lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chur shig/ 'di dag ni khyed cag gi nye du yon// gal te khyed cigs gnang na// ngas 'di rnams kyi ming gis
182b4('dul ba): lon bsnga'o// de rnams kyis gsil pa/ bcom ldan 'das rung lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ de rnams kyi ming
182b5('dul ba): nas yon bsngo ba mdzad// sbyin pa 'di yis bsod nam sa gang // de ni yi dgas rjes 'gro zhing / 'di dag yi dgas 'jig rten ni// mi bzang ba nas myur ldang sho
182b6('dul ba): de yis gos dang skom dang zos// gnas mal rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dus kun du ni mi zad par// de rnams la ni grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thib
182b7('dul ba): pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab
182b8('dul ba): tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las pa'angs te gshegs// de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams tog khang du lhags shing chags nas/ 
183a1('dul ba): ngu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng bar byed/ kye dge slong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen che zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen che ba yid// kha cig gis smras pa/ 
183a2('dul ba): shes ldan dag/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dong zhen chung ste/ mu stegs can rnams ni de lta ma yin// de'i tshe bram ze smra 'dod kyi
183a3('dul ba): zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng+ges/ grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces smraso// 
183a4('dul ba): dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'dod zhin che 'am/ 'did zhen chung ba dang / de'i nyan thos rnams 'dod zhin che 'am/ 'dod zhen chung pa ngas khyed cag yid ches par ba'o// de ras
183a5('dul ba): bram ze smra 'dod kyi sang+ge/ bcom ldan 'das gang ba na der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan go'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun
183a6('dul ba): thabs pacig la/ bdag bca' ba bu ram zhig 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzodadu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng+ge la cang mi gsung pas
183a7('dul ba): gnang // de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng+ges bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang ba ri rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song // de nas bac+doMs kyis dge slong
183a8('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng+ge klan ka tshol bas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bca' ba bu ram la spyan drangs kyis
183b1('dul ba): byang cag pas gang gis ji tsam log pangs detsam zhig blang bar bya'o// bram ze sgra 'dod kyi se la bu ram 'tshong pa'i khang pa lnga brgya yod pa nas/ des bu ram g+haM khang par
183b2('dul ba): bu ram gyi snod blangs te/ bu ram gyi snod lnga brgya khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan go
183b3('dul ba): tam bu rab brdegs na/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ longs spyad gsol/ de ras bcom ldan 'das phya ba dang lhung bzed brlabs nas/ dge slong
183b4('dul ba): gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhu gso// de nas bram ze spu 'dod kyi sing+yas bu ram gyi snod gcig blangs te/ drim pa'i brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan
183b5('dul ba): 'das kyis ji ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi bar du briR+Ya kyang lhags pas/ thod de kho na bzhin du 'dug pa de lta ra byer gyis brlab so// de ras bram ze spu 'dod kyi seng+ge
183b6('dul ba): bar dadang par gyur to// de nas de dang po skyes nas phyogs mtha' dag tu sgra bsgrags pa/ shes ldan go'u ta pa ni 'dod zhen chung zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zher chung
183b7('dul ba): pa yin no// de nas des pa stegs can rnams bu ram la longs spyod de gzhug pa'i phyir 'gron du bos pa dang / de rnams kyis bu ra ma bag med par blangs nas/ ba gcig gis
183b8('dul ba): ni longs spyad // kha gcig gis ni snod bkang nas bor zhing khyer te song ngo // de nas bram ze sme 'dod kyi seng+ges sbas pa/ skyes bu blun po khyed cag kho na 'dong zhar cha ba yan
184a1('dul ba): dge slong go'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhag par yang mngon par dad par
184a2('dul ba): gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du zhes bya ba'i bar gong pa bzhin du ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ce
184a3('dul ba): gsol to// brgyan pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag ces bya ba nas/ rngangs par spyod par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gang ba ba'ir du'o// de nas bcom ldan
184a4('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba nas/ dge slong du re shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces gsungs pas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bka' bar
184a5('dul ba): gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/ dus sam/ ngus pa yin pa
184a6('dul ba): mngon pa 'am/ mi na bas bu ram la longs spyad par bya sti/ 'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa smra/ 'dod kyi seng+ge ro myags pa'i dri mi zhim pas/ sems
184a7('dul ba): gcig pa nyid ma thob nas/ bcom ldan la ngas kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong spu 'dod kyi sa na/ srid pa them pa yin na ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam du dgongs nas/ 
184a8('dul ba): rul ba'i dri mi zhim pa las gyur par gzig so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la/ dge slong smra 'dod kyiseng+ge
184b1('dul ba): bcug lag khang dri dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor la/ gnas ma la la yang bdug pas bdug cing / me tog dri zhim pos brgyan pa'i me tog
184b2('dul ba): gi gdug ras shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan to// ji tsam na de bsod snyoms la song ba nga'i bar du
184b3('dul ba): de'i gtsug lag khang du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' spel pa de bzhin thams cad byaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi sing+ge bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/ gtsub
184b4('dul ba): lag khang du 'ongs pa dang lha'i 'byor pa mthong nas/ de na sa dga' ba'i yid kyis bsod snyoms la longs spyad/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu
184b5('dul ba): rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ lus drang por bsra ngas nas/ dran pa mngon du phyogs par gzhag ste 'dug
184b6('dul ba): pa dang / dri zhib pi mnam nas nga'i sems mnyam par gzhag par skye so// de nas des nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas nas
184b7('dul ba): bya ba nas/ mngon du smra bar gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i dge slong dang / 
184b8('dul ba): nga'i nyan thos sdug pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong smra 'dod kyi sang+ge 'di yi ro// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad
185a1('dul ba): pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/ btsun pa dge slong gzhan rnams ni/ mi sdug pas rnam par grol na/ tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng+ge sdug
185a2('dul ba): pas rnam par grol ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya btud mar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams nas shi 'phos
185a3('dul ba): shing / de nyid du skyes te/ da ltar gyi srid pa tha ma mi rnamasu skyes pa na/ lus rul pa'i dri mnam pas sems rtse gcig pa ma grub pa'o// dri zhim po'i dra man ma nas sems
185a4('dul ba): mnyam pa thob nas sdug pas rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to// gal te 'di la thabs 'di ma byas par gyur na/ dro bar gyur pa yang 'dis bskyed par mi 'gyuraro// de lta
185a5('dul ba): bas na rje su gnang ste/ gzhan gang zhig sdug pa 'di lta bus rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba des rim pa de lta bu ste/ 'di la 'gyod par ni mi bya'o// de nas ba
185a6('dul ba): yul spong byad nas/ ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhug sa
185a7('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can
185a8('dul ba): gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhug so zhes thos// thos nas kyang gcig tu 'dus nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das
185b1('dul ba): yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhug so zhes grags/ 
185b2('dul ba): gal te bdag cag re re nas bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te gdugs tshad gsol na ni/ bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs dang / gzhan gyi skabs mi rnyed par gyur pas/ 
185b3('dul ba): de la khrims shig bcas te/ ci nas kyang tshogs shing 'dus pa khe nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshad gsol gyi/ mi gcig pus ni ma yin zhes de rnams kyis khrims
185b4('dul ba): bca' ba dag byas nas bzhag/ de'i tshe yangs pa cang na bsod nams chen po dang ldan po bzhi gnas te/ nor can dang / nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi
185b5('dul ba): bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma'o// de dag gi khyim du ni lha dang / mi rnams kyi yang bebs par gyur to// de rnams kyi khrimasu bcas pa de ma thos par/ khyim
185b6('dul ba): bdag nor can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang yul spang byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa
185b7('dul ba): brtsegs pa'i gnas/ bzhugs zhes thos// thos nas kyang yangs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dar song ste zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' mdzad
185b8('dul ba): nas cang mi gsung shes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas khyim bdag nor can sten las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs
186a1('dul ba): thal mo sbyar ba bdud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi snum pa
186a2('dul ba): gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzadadu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas/ khyim bdag nor can la gnang // de nas khyim bdag nir can gyis/ bas
186a3('dul ba): mi gsung bas gnang par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song // de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim
186a4('dul ba): bdag rnams langs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'angs gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'dis dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / thabs gcig tu
186a5('dul ba): sang bdag cag sdum par gdubs tshong sbyor zhing mtshos na gnang bar mdzad gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong me bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
186a6('dul ba): gnas 'jog gi bu dag/ nga sngar khyim bdag nor can gyis spyan dras zin to// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag nor can gyis ni tshogs kyi khrims bcas pa las
186a7('dul ba): par byaso// kha cigs smras pa/ tsi ste de 'das par byed/ gdon mi za bar des khrims bcas pa mi tho so// 'on kyang bdag cag pas da ni skyes bu dam pa yin pas/ gdugs tshong gsol
186a8('dul ba): du chu gro bdag cag gis ni gnangs gdugs tshod gsal// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang bar sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang / chos gis thogs nas/ khyimo bdag na
186b1('dul ba): gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin/ shar sgo nas zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas rnams lha gon ma byas pa mthong nas/ de nas khyim bdag nor can la
186b2('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras// khyim bdag khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas/ snying las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa
186b3('dul ba): kun dga' bo ci ste de skad gsung / khyim bdag gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas rnams sta gon mo byas pa mthong // 'phags pa khyod cha bsgo gang nas zhugs/ khyim bdag
186b4('dul ba): shar nas so// 'phags pa lho nas zhugs shig/ de zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na lha'i gdan bshams shing / lha'i zhal zas rnams sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong
186b5('dul ba): nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas khyi ma bdag nor can gyi spyan 'dren gyis/ bcom lda na 'das la dus chod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs
186b6('dul ba): chong ba shams shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzadadu gsol zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs
186b7('dul ba): te lhung bzang gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de na
186b8('dul ba): nor can gyi chung ma stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
187a1('dul ba): dge slong gi dpe 'dun rnams dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum ngar gdugs tshad sbyor zhing mchis/ gnang bar du gsol/ bac+doMs kyis cang rigs
187a2('dul ba): ngas nor can gyi chung ma la gnang // gnang nas kyang khyir bdag nor can la chos bshang po mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegaso// nor can gyi chung mas kyang 'al tha
187a3('dul ba): rnams sta gon byaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na pa der song ste phyi
187a4('dul ba): lho sgo nas zhugs nas/ gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas rnams kyang ste gon ma byas par mthong ngo // ma thang nas kyang nor can gyi chung ma la 'di skad ces smra
187a5('dul ba): khyim bdag gi chung ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slong nga gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/ ci snying las chung ngu sa gnas sam// des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci
187a6('dul ba): skad gsung / gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo // 'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs/ lho naso// 'phags pa shar nas zhugs
187a7('dul ba): shes/ ji tsam na gdan bzang po bshams shing / zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi
187a8('dul ba): ma'i spyan 'dren gyis/ bac+doMs la dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du
187b1('dul ba): gsol zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu par rig nas/ stan ches dpa' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra sngar 'dug zhes bya ba'i
187b2('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor can gyi bu stan las langs te/ bla bos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud / bcom
187b3('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad
187b4('dul ba): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nar can gyi bu la gnang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can gyi chung ma la chos bshad pa mdzad nas brgya
187b5('dul ba): so/ nor can gyi bus kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byaso// de nas tshe dang lnga na ba kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed
187b6('dul ba): dang / chos gos thogs te/ nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lho sgo nas zhugs nas/ gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa yang mthing ngo // @
187b7('dul ba): nas kyang nor can gyi bu la 'di skad ces smraso// khyim bdag gi bu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas/ ci snying las chung dus gnas sar// des
187b8('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste de skad gsung / gdan ma bshams shing 'al zas sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo // 'phags pa khyod chab sgo gang nas zhugs/ ljo nas// 'phags pa
188a1('dul ba): nub nas zhugs shig/ ji tsam na gdan bzang po bshams shing / zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngom tshar skyes pa
188a2('dul ba): gyur to// de nas nor can gyi bu'i spyan 'dren gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la dus chod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs chod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das nga de'i das
188a3('dul ba): la bab par mkhyen par mdzad gsol zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
188a4('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar bdag zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du// de nas nor can gyi mna' ma stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'a ngas gang na de log su thal mo sbyar ba bad / brjes
188a5('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum bar gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad
188a6('dul ba): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas nor can gyi mna' ma la gnang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can gyi bu la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so// de nas
188a7('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ byag+sa
188a8('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba
188b1('dul ba): nas/ cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas

188b3('dul ba): bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzadadu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog gi bu dag dasngar nor can gyi
188b4('dul ba): mna' mas spyan byas zin to// de nas langs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams rngam nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nor can gcig bu la nor yid kyis/ 
188b5('dul ba): cag la med dam ci na/ des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge/ slong gi dge 'dun nyi ma re re gdugs tshod gsol zhing mchis bdag cag kho nas skabs ma theb par gyur/ 
188b6('dul ba): la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshong gsal zan nas gshegs par gyur pa de'i
188b7('dul ba): de'i khyim rdo ba re re nas bkogs te gzhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang bar sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim
188b8('dul ba): na ba dar song ste phyi nas/ gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas kyang sta gon ma byas par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang nor can gyi mna' ma la 'di skad ces smra so// nor can gyi mar
189a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan dras nas/ ci snying las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste de skad gsung

189a7('dul ba): nas sgo na 'dug ste/ de dag gis khyod la gnod pa byas par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ song la bzod pa mdzod cig de phyir byung nas bzod pa gsol par brtsams pa dang / de rnams
189a8('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim bdag ci khyed gcig pu la nor yod dam/ gang gi phyir khyod kyis nyin re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol to// kho bo cad hUM
189b1('dul ba): skangs mi snyed par byed/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gis tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa ma thos kyis/ de bas na tshogs kyi bzod par bya ba'i rig so// gzhan dag gis
189b2('dul ba): smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyes bu 'di ni dam pa yin pas/ 'di la bzod par bya'o zhes de rnams bzod par gyur pa dang / des smras pa/ gal te de lta na nang du zhugs shig/ de rnam
189b3('dul ba): khyim du zhugs pa dang / gdan bzang po bshams shing zhal zas bsod pa rnams sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur nas/ smras pa/ 
189b4('dul ba): khyim bdag khyed 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs chod bsol par 'os kyi kho bo cag ni ma yi no// des de rnams la rin po che dag byin pa dang
189b5('dul ba): de rnams kyis ma blangs// de nas bcom ldan 'ang sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ rin po che 'di dag ni da par dka' ba yin gyis lo shig/ de rnams kyis blangs pa la
189b6('dul ba): gang gis ci 'dra ba blangs pa de'i kha dog de 'dre ba kho nar snang bar gyur to// de nas nor can gyi mna' mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bzhugs par rig nas/ 
189b7('dul ba): gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag gis zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung zad gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te ches mnyan pa'i phyir
189b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can dang / nar can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nar
190a1('dul ba): gyi mna' ma rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen na/ gang thos na nor can dang / nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi
190a2('dul ba): dang / nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i raM'i rtse mo nyi shu mthob ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta
190a3('dul ba): bur 'phags pa'i bden pa ba'i so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas/ lan gsum che du brjod pas tshad brjod pa zhes pa ba
190a4('dul ba): bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyab su mchi lags kyis
190a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag cag dag bsnyen du bzla dadu gsal/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang ba sngos te/ skyab su mchis par mngon par dang lags/ 
190a6('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can dang / nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bsdu

190b1('dul ba): can gyi mchis brang dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che'i rigs

190b3('dul ba): po tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA ra na se na/ me tog phreng ba rgyud mkhan 'ag
190b4('dul ba): yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed// de lhan cig rtse bar byed/

190b6('dul ba): tu dkren par gyur nas/ de dang bu dang / chung ma dang / mna' mas brtson pa chen pos 'bad pas/ dar yug gcig cig grub nas/ de nas me tog phreng rgyud mkhan yang de
190b7('dul ba): bgos nas rgyal po me tog phreng 'bul/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi chung ma yang de nyid bgos nas btsun mo la 'bul/ me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu yang de nyid bgos nas
190b8('dul ba): gzhon nu rnams la 'bul/ me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma yang de nyid bgos nas/ rgyal po'i mna' ma rnams la me to be phreng 'bul bar byed// sangs rgyas rnas
191a1('dul ba): byung ba med pa na/ 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / ngan pa la snying brje ba/ gnas mal bas mtha' la bsten pa/ 'jig rten gyi yon pas
191a2('dul ba): gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ nyi ma nub ka'i dus su wA ra na se phyin nas/ me tog phreng rgyad mkhar nga
191a3('dul ba): khyim grong khyer gyi sgo na 'dug pa de'i ldum rar nub mo gnas btab ste/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs// de nas me tog phrang rgyud mkhan des/ mo'i phung po 'bar ba
191a4('dul ba): lta bur mthong nas/ de dang pa skyes te/ chung ma la smras pa dang / de yang dad par gyur to// des bu la smras pa dang // de yang dad par gyur to// des mna' ma la smras pa dang / de
191a5('dul ba): yang dad par gyur to// de nas de rnams kyis gros bya bar brtsams pa/ bdag cag sang zan ma zos kyi nga bla 'dus la/ rab tu byung ba/ zhi ba// zhi ba'i bad
191a6('dul ba): nyid can 'di bshos gsol lo// de nas nam langs nas/ de rnams kyis de la bsod snyoms phulo// me tog phreng rgyu mkhan gyis smras pa/ bzang mo kho bo'i ras kyi bag
191a7('dul ba): skal gang yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung ba 'di la dbu'o// des smras pa/ rje'i sras ngadagi ying dbu'o// bus smras pa/ bdag gi yang dbu'o// mna' mas smras pa/ bdag yang
191a8('dul ba): dbu lo 'angs de rnams 'dus nas/ de la ras bskon to// bdag nyid chen po de dag ni/ lus kyis chos ston gyi// tshig gis ma yin pas// de nas bdag nyid chen po de rnams la
191b1('dul ba): snying brtse ba'i phyir na mkha' la 'phags nas/ 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsam so// so so'i skye bo rnams mi
191b2('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul myur du sems gtong ba yin pas/ shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag cag gis yon
191b3('dul ba): gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag phyug cing nor mngal/ longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skye zhing / bdag cag gi khyim du lha dang / 
191b4('dul ba): g.yang 'bab par gyur cig/ 'di lta bu'i chos rnam sa kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed kyi/ mi mnyes par byed par ma
191b5('dul ba): gyur cig ces byas// de nas rang sangs rgyas kyis de rnams la snying brtse bas rdzu 'phrul byas nas rgyal po 'i khab kyi steng na bar chas te song ba dang / de'i grib mas
191b6('dul ba): rgyal po'i steng du bab pa dang / de gdong bstod de blta bar brtsams pa dang / bdag nyid chen po de mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag nyid chen po 'dis yongasu zhig ga bkren
191b7('dul ba): ba'i rtsa ba phyung bar gyur snyam// me tog phreng rgyud mkhan de rgyal po la me tog 'bul ba'i dus gang yin pa de las theg gi tsam zhig yo lo// rgyal po yang me tog la sdod
191b8('dul ba): cing 'dug/ de nas me tog phreng rgyud mkhan de/ rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis bkug pa dang / rgyal pos de la smras pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis me tog de ring dus las yol
192a1('dul ba): ngas ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos ji snyed gyon pabyin// de bzhin du me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi chung ma la ni bcun po rnams
192a2('dul ba): ji snyed gyon pa byin// me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu la ni bzho nu rnams kyiso// me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma la ni rgyal ba'i mna' ma rnams kyis te/ de mthong ba
192a3('dul ba): chos de nyid la nor gyi me tog mngon par grub par te/ dbul ba med par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi me tog phrang rgyud mkhan gang yin par
192a4('dul ba): ni nor can 'di nyid yino// me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi chung ma gang yin pa
192a5('dul ba): ni nor can gyi chung ma yin// me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu gang yin pa den/ nar can gyi bu yin// me ti ga phrang rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma nor can gyi mna'
192a6('dul ba): yar te/ 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing / smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs
192a7('dul ba): skyes nas/ khyim du lha dang mi'i g.yang babs par gyur te// nga'i spyan snga nas kyang bden pa mthong bar byas te/ nga rang sangs rgyas bya ba brgya stong pas khyad par du 'phags pa
192a8('dul ba): ston pa/ 'di dag gis mnyes par byas kyi/ mi mnyes par ni ma yin// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal bar bya ste/ da
192b1('dul ba): slong dag khyed kyi de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur
192b2('dul ba): stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
192b3('dul ba): dang thangs gcig la/ bdag cig gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' ches gos dang / bsod snyom dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi spyan sman dang / yo byad rnams 'bul zhing
192b4('dul ba): mchis na/ gnang bar mdzadadu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la gnang // de nas langs pa can gyi byam
192b5('dul ba): bdag dang / bram ze rnams bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rigs nas/ bcom ldan 'ad sa kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ 
192b6('dul ba): stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas yengs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsa nga zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta don
192b7('dul ba): byas te zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bsabs te/ lhung bzed gyu bar rigs nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dub
192b8('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtem gyis yang dag par bstan
193a1('dul ba): yang dag par len du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gsheg so// de
193a2('dul ba): nyid nyi ma gnyis sam/ gsum gyi bar du 'das// yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi/ 'khor ba rgya chen po mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ de rnams
193a3('dul ba): kyi nying dag zas kyi phyir shi ma re re zhing 'di bas/ de dag gis gces par gyur nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ 'phags bdag mu ge dang bcas po'i dris byung bas/ ngang / 
193a4('dul ba): cag gi 'du dag sbyar mchis te/ de rnams la bdag ca ga gdugs gcig bzhin stsol bas/ khyed cag dang de rnams la khyab par rngo mo thog na/ kye 'phags pa dag
193a5('dul ba): bdag cag gis yo byad rnams dbul gyis/ zhal ta kho na mdzod cig/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o zhes dge slong rnams
193a6('dul ba): kyis skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis zhal tu bya'o// bac+doMs kyi
193a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi zhal ta bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ de rnams kyis zhal ta bya bair brtsams te/ ji tsam na steng g.yogs med par thug pa 'tsheng po'i zhal dang+ga
193a8('dul ba): pa las/ lhas char phab pas des ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng g.yogs med par
193b1('dul ba): btso bar mi bya'o// sgo khang dang / khyam su 'tshed par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang dang / khyam su btso bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ 
193b2('dul ba): rung ba'i gnas kyi gnar/ mi rung ba'i bcu po 'di dag ste/ 'di rnamasu zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// bcu gang zhen/ steng g.yogs med pa dang / sgo khang dang / khyams dang / bsra
193b3('dul ba): khang dang / khrus khang dang / rgyal po'i gnas dang / mchod rten gyi gnas dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / khyim bdag gi gnas dang / dge slong ma'i dbyar khang // bzhi cu po
193b4('dul ba): 'di dag ni rung ba ma yin pa gnas kyi gzhi yin te/ de rnamasu dge slong gis zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// la ta byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro// 
193b5('dul ba): sdom ni/ nad bu can dang zas dag dang / g.yar chus lhag pa dag dang yang // tshal gyi 'bras bu chu skyes dang / pad+ma'i rdza dang lug dag// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// 
193b6('dul ba): mnyan yod na/ dge slong nang bu can zhig yod pas des sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzangs dag kho bo la sman ston cig/ des nad gyi gni dris nas smras pa/ 'phags pa zug pa
193b7('dul ba): gsol cig dang sos par 'gyuraro// des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gon // sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas/ 
193b8('dul ba): 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yod// des skabs de dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bac+doMs
194a1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pas thug pa 'thung shig ces zer na/ sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// 
194a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de'i nad g.yog gis thug pa grang mo zhog khyer te byin// de nas ldan pas 'ong
194a3('dul ba): nas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyad bde 'am/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs mi bde'o// ci khyod kyis thug pa ma gsol tam/ 'thungs so// tse 'dra ba zhig/ brang mo'i// 'phagra
194a4('dul ba): pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// sang ni dron mo gsol cig/ de nas nga'i nang gdog gis blangs nas grang mo kha na rnyed nas/ des de bsros te byin// de nas sman pa la
194a5('dul ba): te de bzhin du dris pa dang / des smras pa/ mi bde'o// ci thugs pa ma gsol tam/ 'thungs// ci 'dra ba zhig grang mo zhig bsros naso// 'phags pa ma legs pa
194a6('dul ba): shig bgyis so// de grang ste bsros pa las kyis/ ngas ni rang bzhin gyis dron por mdzod de gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad g.yog gis 'bras dang snod sta gon byas nas/ gtsub
194a7('dul ba): lag khang gi phyi rol gyi shing drung zhig tu btso bar brtsams pa las/ de nas kha'i rtug pas/ de ma rung bar byas pas/ dge slong de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong
194a8('dul ba): rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ rung ba'i gnas sko bar bya
194b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas bsgo bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis ci 'dra ba dang / ji tsam pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
194b2('dul ba): stsal pa/ rung ba'i gnas lnga ste/ rtsom pa'i mtha' can dang / sems gtong ba'i mtha' can dang / ba nyal ba lta bu dang / stong pa'i gnas dang / bskos pa'o// de la rtsom pa
194b3('dul ba): mtha' can ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas nas rngom pa na/ der thog ma ra ba ni 'di ni dge 'dun gyis rung ba'i gnasu 'gyur zhes sems bskyed cing / tshig tu sbas
194b4('dul ba): pa ste/ 'di ni rung ba'i gnas brtsom pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// sems gtod pa'i mtha' can gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas der thog mer rdo ba 'deg pa na/ 
194b5('dul ba): 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa da ga gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnasu 'gyur/ ba'i nges par zung shig/ nges par zung shig ces bya ba
194b6('dul ba): ste/ 'di ni sems gtod pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// ba nyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/ gang la sgo tha dad por ga ses pa ste/ 'di ni pa zhal ba lta bu zhes bya'o// gnas
194b7('dul ba): stong pa gang zhe na/ spangs pa'i gnas te/ 'di ni gnas stong pa zhes bya'o// bskos pa gang zhe na/ gsol pa dang / gnyis kyi las bskos pa'o// dge slong rnams kyis
194b8('dul ba): ltar bsgo ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par byas pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang
195a1('dul ba): bcas pa la/ dge 'dun gyis 'dod na de bsko bar bya'o// bsgo ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la/ gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i
195a2('dul ba): tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol pa byas te/ las bya'o// 
195a3('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung po'i gan+da
195a4('dul ba): su bstod/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bcwo ngan/ dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshangs dang / phyi rol pa 'khor 'jom gang pa
195a5('dul ba): bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnasu bsko'o// 'di ni ga sol pa'o// las ni 'di ltar ba ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ 
195a6('dul ba): nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bzhed de/ de'i slang du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams
195a7('dul ba): dang phyi rol gi 'khor 'dos gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gan su bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / 
195a8('dul ba): rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnasu bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun
195b1('dul ba): gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bgyis lags pa// nang mtshams dang / phyi rol te 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i
195b2('dul ba): su sros lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang du dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gan su skos pa der gnyis skabs dbye ste/ mtshams kyi nang du bcos pa dang
195b3('dul ba): mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugaso// yangs pa tsan+da sde dpon sang+ge
195b4('dul ba): zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i nyen kor na gnas pa rnams kyis/ de'i tshe che du sha khyer te 'ongs nas/ de yang za bar byeng// gang gi tshe nges bcom ldan 'das las bdan
195b5('dul ba): mthong ba de'i tshe/ maza bas khyer te 'ongs na yang dge slong rnams la sbyin par byed// dge slong rnams kyis kyang de dag zos pa dang / mu stegs can rnams snga
195b6('dul ba): par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed/ shes ldan dag sde dpon sang+ge'i tshe du byas te/ sha khyer te 'ongs na ni/ des de dag ma zos la shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnam
195b7('dul ba): la byin pa dang / kAkya'i sras kyi dag sbyong rnams kyi cha du byas pa'i shin thos zhes bya ba'i skabs de dag dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsas pa dang / ba
195b8('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba ma yin pa'i shaza bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa gsum gang zhe na/ bdage gi du byas par yangan sum du
196a1('dul ba): bar rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las khyod kyi che du byas pa yino zhes pa thos pa/ rung ba dzin pa'i
196a2('dul ba): bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / rang nyid kyi blo las rnam par rtog pa skyes pa tshul las 'di ni bdag gi tshe du byis pa yi ro snyam du rung ba ma yin pa'i ka bza'
196a3('dul ba): mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yino// dge slong dag ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dis bdag gi tshe du byed par mngon
196a4('dul ba): du mo mthong ba rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsu dris pa dang / lid ches pa las 'ongs khyed kyi tshidu byas pa ma yin zhes thos pa rung ba'i go bzang bar bya
196a5('dul ba): zhes gsungs pa dang / bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa tshul las 'di bdag gi che du byas pa yin snyam pa ma skyes pa/ rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o
196a6('dul ba): gsungs pa yin// / gleng gzhi ni mnyan yed na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong dag ltogs par gyur pas de rnams rga
196a7('dul ba): phab ste 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i bstan pa la/ ci'i srang glos pab ste bzhugs
196a8('dul ba): dag pa'i phyogs la brtson par mi mdzad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ bsod snyoms lto 'drangs par mi rnyed pas/ kho bo cag sdigs
196b1('dul ba): mchung bas ngas na glos pa ba ste 'dug// de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci ste zhal chus mi gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang // khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pa
196b2('dul ba): gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do zhes bya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
196b3('dul ba): slong dag de'i phyir rje su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur dge slong rnams kyis g.yar tshwas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// / gleng gzhi ni
196b4('dul ba): mnyan yod na'o// mu ga dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong rnams la bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba
196b5('dul ba): mdzad cig/ de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ bsod snyoms lngar rnyed pa khyer nas gtsug lab khang du song ste/ de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de yang
196b6('dul ba): bar 'dod na/ 'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skab sa de dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjesu gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'a
196b7('dul ba): lta bur 'dod na/ sngar blangs zin to snyam du sems la/ sngar rnyed pa yang bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// / gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu
196b8('dul ba): ga dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la mgron du bos nas// de rnams kyis zos pa dang / bca' ba las
197a1('dul ba): lhag ma zhig luso// bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed kyi tshe du sta gon bgyis pa lags kyi/ snoms te bzhung 'a phyis
197a2('dul ba): gsol cig/ de rnams kyis khyer te dang ngo // dong nas de bza' bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zas pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
197a3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjesu gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'di dag ni byin pa yin snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi
197a4('dul ba): bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod ni'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams
197a5('dul ba): mgron du bos te/ de rnams kyis zos nas/ bca' ba la sogs pa cung zad cig lhag ste/ dge slong rnam sa dong ba dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras
197a6('dul ba): pa/ 'di ni bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag kho na la yongasu btang ba lags te/ 'tshal te mchis la/ khyed kho na la dngu lo zhes de rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnam
197a7('dul ba): de la yang za bar 'dod na/ 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs te/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der phyir rdzasu
197a8('dul ba): gnang ste mu be'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur/ sngar yongasu btang ba'o snyam du bsam nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par ni mo bya'o// gleng ga'i ni mnyan
197b1('dul ba): yod na'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis nub phyogs kyi mchis na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas/ de rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'di dag ni rnyed dka' ba yin pas
197b2('dul ba): 'phags pa rnams la dbu lo zhes de dag gis dge slong rnams zas zos nas spang ba byas pa rnams la de dag byin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis spang pa byas zer no zhes 'gyod pas
197b3('dul ba): ma zos pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams la yon
197b4('dul ba): gnas bgyid pa las/ da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas/ khyed rnams kyang da ni yon gan su gyur pa lags na/ gal te khyod kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag gi
197b5('dul ba): dge ba'i shul rgyags dang bral te/ 'jig rten 'di na sa 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi bar bgyi 'am/ de lta bas na thugs brtse bas ba zhes shig pa'i skabs de/ 
197b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rje su gnang ste/ rnyed dka' ba'i no snyam bsams nas bza'
197b7('dul ba): bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di dag yin te/ dgun 'brum dang / bal po se'u dang / 'brog go dang / star rga dang / yon tshe dang / 
197b8('dul ba): shing tog u ra ma na dang / shing tog u ru ma yi/ shing tog ni ko tsa dang / shing teg pa b+hu dang / shing tog sin tsi ka'o// gleng gni ni mnyan yod na'o// bram ze
198a1('dul ba): khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams zas zos zin pa dang / chu nas skyes pa dag phul ba dang / dge slong rnams 'dod kyang spang ba byas
198a2('dul ba): zin to zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed dka' ba yin snyam du
198a3('dul ba): bsams bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la chu nas skye ba ni 'di dag yin te/ ud pa la dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / ku mu da'i sa bon dang / pad+ma'i sa bon no// gla
198a4('dul ba): gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kha mas ma snyoms pas khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur to// rim gro byed pa tshe dang ldan pa mo ru dgal gyi bu
198a5('dul ba): chen ngos bsams pa/ bdag rang gi blas ni tshe dang ldan ba shA ri'i bu la lan mang du rim gro byas kyi/ lan 'a ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyi/ ma la bdag gis
198a6('dul ba): snyam nas/ des sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzangs tshe dang ldani pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur na// de'i sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa
198a7('dul ba): rtsa ba'i 'o ma stsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/ pad+ma'i rtsa dpal ba'i
198a8('dul ba): 'o mas rim gro bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yino snyam du bsams nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/ dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i
198b1('dul ba): 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi gnas dang nye bar gyur pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis
198b2('dul ba): mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir byon/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang ngad kan 'khrugs nas/ de la sman pas pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma
198b3('dul ba): bstan to// klu'i rgyal po'i rang brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gal to de lta na re shig bzhes shig/ de dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs mi'i tshad tsam gyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag
198b4('dul ba): gton cing bston cing / pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad+ma'i mdab ma'i skyo rar gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang // tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal
198b5('dul ba): byi bu chen pos pad+ma'i rtsa ba gshegs pa la blta bar brtsams pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rang bstan gyi sa smras pa/ 'phags pa ci gzigs/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag
198b6('dul ba): gsol bar bzhed dam/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / smras pa dang / 'phags pa bzhud cig dang bsku ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i'o
198b7('dul ba): mas lhung bzang bkang ba khyer nas dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar byas te/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra bA
198b8('dul ba): phyin to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sman pas bstan pa bzhin pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas sos par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis kyang glang po chen pa
199a1('dul ba): cha byang 'chang la pad+ma'i rtsa ba khur cig bskur nas/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la/ gtsug lag khang gi khyim kyi mdudan du 'og
199a2('dul ba): la shog/ de rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa'i thus/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams khyams kyi mdun du
199a3('dul ba): bzhag nas/ slar log pa las lam gyi phyed na tshal gyi bal glang mo zhig yod pa dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na bal glang mo de las ngal glang phragu
199a4('dul ba): cig 'brangs te/ 'brangs pa'i modo la sang+ge'i sgra 'byin to// de nas ngal glang mo de skrag pas gci na rtug gtor nas/ bal glang phrag gu bor te broso// de nas rgyal po
199a5('dul ba): khab na gnas pa'i shing mkhan zhig shing gi cha du tshal du song ba las ngal glang phrug gu de mthong nas/ khyim ngag du blangs bskrun gsos bskyed/ nor gyis
199a6('dul ba): dasbyangs pas/ ming nor skyong nor skyong zhes bya bar brags// kha cig ni rgyal po gsapa rgyal gyis/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nor skyong sku su bskur ba las de mnyan yod
199a7('dul ba): kyi yul na gnas pa la skye bos nor gyis bsnyungs pa nor bskyong zhes 'don to// pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos zos/ khe cig ni tshe dang ldan pa shA
199a8('dul ba): ri'i bus/ kha cig ni dge 'dun la brims pa las 'on kyang lhag par gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas nas kyang za 'dod na bdag cag gis spang bar bya/ 
199b1('dul ba): zhes ma zos pa'i skyabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i pad+ma'i rtsa
199b2('dul ba): rnyed par dka' bas de'i phyir rje su gan // pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed pa dka' ba yino snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// 
199b3('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe grong khyer bzang byed na bsod nams chen por shes bya ba drug gnas te/ khyim bdag lug ces bya ba dang / lug gi chung ma dang / 
199b4('dul ba): lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug baM bran pho dang / lug gi bran mo'o// khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar ji ltar shes zhe na/ gal te bang mdzod stong
199b5('dul ba): pa rnams la bsdus na/ mthong ma thag kho nar gang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes// lug gi chung ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des
199b6('dul ba): gcig gi don du snod du bcos pa ni brgya stong gi bza' ba 'byung ste/ lug gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin// lug gi bu ni ji lta bu zhe na/ de'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod pa
199b7('dul ba): 'dug la/ des gang gi tshe brgya 'am/ stong yongasu btang ba de'i tshe/ de bzhin du gang bar 'dug ste/ yongasu zad par mi 'gyur te/ lug gi bu ni de lta bu yino// lug gi
199b8('dul ba): mna' ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du dri sbyar na/ brgya stong khyed par 'gyur/ lug gi mna' ma ni de lta bu yi no// lug gi bran po ji lta bu zhe na/ des gang che zhing
200a1('dul ba): la rol cig rmos pada'i tshe/ zhing la rol bdun rmos par 'gyur te/ de lug gi bran po ni de lta yin// lug gi bran mo ji ltar na bsod nams che bar shes
200a2('dul ba): de gang gi tshe gang tsam dus pa de'i tshe/ bdun tsam du skyes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na lug gi bran mo bsod nams che ba yino// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gdul
200a3('dul ba): ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang
200a4('dul ba): byed gshegs kyis/ khyed cig las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba da ni/ chos gos rnam
200a5('dul ba): long shog ces sgo shing // btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal na/ sa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe
200a6('dul ba): ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang
200a7('dul ba): byedadu 'dong bar spro ba de ni chos gos rnams long shig/ tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan to// de nas bac+doMs
200a8('dul ba): dul ba/ 'khor dul ba dang / zhi ba/ 'khor zhi ba/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dang / ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan
200b1('dul ba): 'das mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams mtha' 'khob du dong ba las/ de nas kha cig grong khyer bzang byed dong nas gnas pa de rnams
200b2('dul ba): dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos// thos nas kyang rong rong por gyur nas/ bdag cag sngon ni dge sbyong go'u ta mas yul dbus nas spyug so// de gal te 'dir 'ongs na gzu
200b3('dul ba): mi za bar bdag cag 'di nas sprugs par 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyamo// de rnams rigs kyi khyim dag tu dong nas smras pa/ chos thob par gyur cig
200b4('dul ba): chos thob par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dag de ci lags/ shes ldan dag bltas zin gyis 'gro'o// ci'i sla re shig/ khyed cag gi 'byar pa phun sum tshogs pa ni kha
200b5('dul ba): cag gis mthong gis/ ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'dong ngo // 'phags pa dag bdag cag la nu dpa tsa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ shes ldan
200b6('dul ba): ngag dge sbyong go'u ta ma spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing / du ma zhig bu med pa dang / khyim thab med par byed cing 'ong ngo // 'phags pa dag gal te de lta na gang gi dus kho nar ba zhes
200b7('dul ba): par bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang bar bgyi 'am/ bzhugs shig/ ma bzhud cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag ci ste 'dug/ khyed cag kho bo cag gi nyan
200b8('dul ba): mi btub bo// 'phags pa dag gsungs shig/ mnyan par bgyi'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams
201a1('dul ba): cang gnas nas byung la/ grong khyer bzangs byed kyi nang du chud cig/ rtswa sngon po rnams ni rdos shig 'dug gnas rnams ni shig/ me tog dang / 'bras bu'i zhing
201a2('dul ba): rnams ni chod cig/ chu rnams ni dug lugs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gzhugs shig dang / thams cad bgyi'o// de nas de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang
201a3('dul ba): byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas bton nas/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du bcud de/ rtswa sngon po rnams ni brngas/ 'dug gnas rnams ni bshag
201a4('dul ba): me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni bcad/ chu rnams ni dug drug so// daM mas lha rnams kyi dab nga pe brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur
201a5('dul ba): sti ma yin pa byed pa yal bar dor ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bska la pa grangs med pa gsum du bka' ba brgya stong du mas
201a6('dul ba): pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten thams cad med pa'i yul stong du rgyu zhing gshegs pa
201a7('dul ba): bya 'am/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bde ba la reg par bya'o snyam nas/ des rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/ song la
201a8('dul ba): chu dug can rnams skams shig/ cher ba 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/ 'di rnams kyis bskams pa dang / khyod kyis chu yani lag brgyad dang ldan pas khong shig/ 
201b1('dul ba): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la yang bsgo ba/ khyed kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas thob shig/ de nas rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bus ni chu dug can rnams
201b2('dul ba): bskam so// char ba 'bebs pa'i lha'i bus na der yang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas bkang // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor
201b3('dul ba): du gnas btab nas/ long spyod rnams 'byor cing rgyas par gyur to// mu stegs can rnams kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams bstsog nas/ de rnams kyis rtog
201b4('dul ba): chen dag mngags te ljongs rnams ci 'dra stos shig/ de rnams dong ba las/ ljongs rnams lhag par yang 'byor cing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas/ slar 'ongs
201b5('dul ba): smras pa/ shes ldan dag ljongs 'di lta bur 'byor ci nga rgyas pa ni sngon lan 'ga' yang bdag cag gis ma mthong ngo // mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ shas
201b6('dul ba): ldan dag khyod kyis mthong ngam/ re shig gang zhig sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang bsgyur bar byed pa des/ khyed cag bsgyur bar mi byed pa de lta srid re skan/ khyed cag
201b7('dul ba): rnam pa thams cad bltas zin te blta ba'i mtha' ma byas nas 'gro'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig/ khyed cag la dge sbyong go'u ta mus ci zhig
201b8('dul ba): bgyir mchis/ de yang rab tu byung ba lags/ khyed kyang rab tu byung ba slong zhing 'tsho ba lags na/ ci des khyed cag gi slong ba bkag par 'gyur snyam 'am/ mu stegs can
202a1('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bcas te/ gal te khyed cag sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la lta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing / gang zhig 'gro ba de la chung
202a2('dul ba): kar sha pa na drug cus bcad par khrims 'cha' na 'dug go// de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrimasu bcaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu 'ong gshegs te/ rim
202a3('dul ba): gyis grong khyer bzang byed gshegs nas/ bzang byed kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas shig na bzhug so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo grong khyer bzed bye bag mar btang
202a4('dul ba): des ra ba'i kha na 'dug pas/ bcom ldan 'das mun khang na bzhugs pa mthong nas des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rigs dga' bar mdzad pa/ shAkya
202a5('dul ba): rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas/ rab tu byung ba de ni 'di yaM na ti/ gal te 'di la them skas shig yod par gyur/ na/ bdag mar me thog la 'babs pa zhig/ ngan
202a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas/ tham skas zhig sprul to// de nas de snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas mar me thogs te them skas
202a7('dul ba): babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mar me bzhag nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ chos mnya
202a8('dul ba): pa'i phyir 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa ba
202b1('dul ba): so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdza zhes bya ba nas/ skyab su mchi bar mngon par dang lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar bong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
202b2('dul ba): kyis bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod tshur shog khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang / de la ngan re nad med par gyur cig ces smos pa
202b3('dul ba): 'di skad ces kyang smros shig/ khyim bdag khyod kyi ched kho nar nga 'dir 'ongs na/ khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba de cig rigs
202b4('dul ba): sam/ gal te tshogs kyis khrims bca' bar byas zhes smras pa dang / khyod kyi bu'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa 'i snod btags te 'dug pa/ des gal te brgya 'am
202b5('dul ba): stong 'god par btang na yang gang ba nyid 'dug cing / yo ngasu zad par mi 'gyur na/ khyod kar sha pa na drag cu byin nas 'od mi nus sam zhes smos shig/ btsun pa
202b6('dul ba): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ bu mo ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas chas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sus kyang mi tshor ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas
202b7('dul ba): khyim bdag lug gi gan du song ste phyin pa dang / smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das khyod la nang med par gyur cig ces gsungs// des smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas
202b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalo// khyim bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kho na'i tshe du nga'i 'dir gshegs na/ khyod sgo bcang nas 'dug pa/ grwa
203a1('dul ba): bu ba la ji ltar khyed byed pa de lta bur bya ba cig rigs sam/ des smras pa/ bu mo tshogs kyis khring su bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong bo'u ta ma la ngabalta ba'i
203a2('dul ba): phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o// gang zhig 'gro na de tshogs kyis kar sha pa na drug cu'i chad pas bcang do zhes// khyim bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyad kyi
203a3('dul ba): bu'i rkeng pa na lnga brgya pa'i snod cig gtugs te 'dug pa/ des gal te brgya 'am/ stong 'god par btang na gang ba kho nar 'gyur zhing yongs zad par mi 'gyur na// 
203a4('dul ba): sha pa na drug cu byin nas/ khyed 'ong bar mi nus sam zhes gsung // des bsams pa/ 'di ni sus kyang mi shes na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin
203a5('dul ba): byas 'gro'o snyam nas/ nges kar sha ba na drug cu sgor bzhag nas bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i them ska sa las 'angab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
203a6('dul ba): song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo ngos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'a
203a7('dul ba): kyis khyim bdag lug gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
203a8('dul ba): chos po shang ba mdzad/ khyim bdag lug gis nga thos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byaso zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 
203b1('dul ba): bden pa mthong nas gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bzang byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang cig 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob par 'gyur
203b2('dul ba): ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa// khyim bdag khyod la brten nas phal char kun gyis 'thob pa kha
203b3('dul ba): nar 'gyuraro// de nas khyim bdag lug gis bac+doMs kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/ de khyim du phyin nas grong
203b4('dul ba): khyer gyi nang du kar sha pa na'i phung po gcer te/ tshegasu bcad pas smras pa/ gang zhig rgyal ba 'dod chags sbyin bcom rtsod med pa// mtshungs pa mang
203b5('dul ba): pa gser gyi mdog can blta 'dod pa// de ni 'jig sa med snying gis shin tu nges byos la// myur du de ngas shig de yi nor ni kho bos gzhal// skye bo'i cho
203b6('dul ba): gyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur ram/ nges smras pa/ dge bar 'gyu ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na tshogs kho nas khri/ 
203b7('dul ba): su bcas pa/ tshogs kho nas bshig tu zad mod/ 'di rnams kyis khrim su bcas pa bshog nas 'byung bar brtsam so// de nas phan tshun sngos pas 'byung bar ma nus pa dang / 
203b8('dul ba): gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes 'dus pa'i skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phags pas rab dral nas/ srog chags brgya stong du ma kha cig ni ye mtshon skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dag
204a1('dul ba): / rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung // de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dpag tshad gcig tshun chad 'khor bar
204a2('dul ba): 'dug// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gden bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ sems can du ma
204a3('dul ba): ngag ga rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa'i chos bshad nga mdzad/ de thos nas kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ngon du byas zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig gsan
204a4('dul ba): skyabasu 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangaso na sa bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po brgyad pa/ bac+doMs
204a5('dul ba): kyis yun ring zhig tu chos bshad pas/ gdugs cho dkyi dus las yol bar gyur to// khyim bdag lu ga gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi
204a6('dul ba): mdzad pa mdzadadu gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag zas kyi dus las yol bar gyur to// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus ma lags par rung ba
204a7('dul ba): ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mar dang / bu rim dang / hwags dang /  kha ra dang / btung ba dag/ de nas khyim bdag lug gos g.yas mkhan dag bkug
204a8('dul ba): ste/ smras pa/ shes ldan dag dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams myur du sta gon gyis shig/ de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams sta gon bya'o// des nas khyim bdag
204b1('dul ba): lug gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i gtung ba rnams kyis tshim par byaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das
204b2('dul ba): kyis khyim bdag lug 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams la so sor bkod/ ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du btul te gshegs
204b3('dul ba): pa na/ khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shul gyi snyun rgyags kyi zong kar sha pa na dag bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya
204b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis kar sha pa na blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsang ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsaropa
204b5('dul ba): rung ba byed paso// rung ba byed pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gyis// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
204b6('dul ba): bar 'khor gyis nus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyi bslab pa'i gzhi bcu pa ra gser dngul len pa gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshu
204b7('dul ba): gyis blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ji lta bu legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor ngas 'chang bar byed pa las dgongs te gsungs kyi/ 
204b8('dul ba): blang ba ni ma yin te/ de bas na dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'i/ blangs nas bdag gir ni mi bya'o// khyim bdag lugs gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das tha ma dang
205a1('dul ba): bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyi su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ 
205a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pa 'am/ dge tshul med na/ dge slong gis zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs nas/ rang nyid kyis bkur bir bya'o// dge slong dang
205a3('dul ba): gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa gnyis bkrus nas sbyin len byas te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du
205a4('dul ba): bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/ dge slong zhig gi mdun du 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgod su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i sman 'di dang
205a5('dul ba): dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabo zhes de skad len gnyi sa lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas pa
205a6('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bu ram zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// zhes gang gsungs pa su zhig
205a7('dul ba): gis 'tshal bar bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/ lam du zhugs pa dang / smyung nga byas pa dang / nad pa dang dge skos dang / la gog blaso// dges
205a8('dul ba): ljongs rgyur chas pa rnams kyis/ 'bras dang / phye dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las/ lam gyis ngal nas/ bza' bar 'dod nas/ 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/ da
205b1('dul ba): snang rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas des zas kyi byang byed mi nus pas/ 'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang
205b2('dul ba): yin pade sprugs nas bze' bar bya'o// phye rnams gang yin pa de chus bkrus nas bza' bar bya'o// kha cig zhu bar gyur pa de bkrur ma rung ste/ zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur
205b3('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skug ma'i tshal pas bzhar la chus bkru bar bya'o// 'on kyang zos med par bkru ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
205b4('dul ba): stsal pa/ legs par gsal te/ chu'i nang du mnyes la gtung bar byas nas/ de tshigs kyis btsags la ba tung bar bya ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong rna
205b5('dul ba): the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag lug dang / lug gi mchis drang nga
205b6('dul ba): lug gi buM dang / lug gi gna' ma dang / lug gi bran po dang / lug gi dran mos las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na de drug bsod nams chen por gyur cing / bcom ldan 'a
205b7('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong nas/ 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis kyi/ ma mnyes par ni ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
205b8('dul ba): dag 'ang dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag
206a1('dul ba): sngon byung ba/ wA ra na sa'i grong khyer du/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed 'dzag/ de'i tshe wA ra na sa'i grong khyer du ltas mkhan rnams
206a2('dul ba): lo bcu gnyi su char mi 'bangs pas/ thur mas 'tsho ba'i mu ge chen po 'byung bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan to// mu ge rnam pa gsum ni za ma tog dang / rus gong dkar po dang / 
206a3('dul ba): thur mas 'tsho ba'o// de la za ma tog ces bya ba ni/ za ma tog de'i nang du mi rnams kyis 'bru dag blugs te/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi che du bzhag nas/ bdag
206a4('dul ba): cag shin 'bru 'dis mi de dag gi bya ba byed par 'gyuraro/ snyam pa ste/ 'di ni za ma tog dang 'brel bas za ma to/ gces bya'o// rus gong dkar po gang zhe na/ dus ngan ma
