232b7('dul ba): ngag de'i blo gros bzhi ni byed/ des na de ltar 'jam po dang bcas par spring bar byed// dum bus sa skyong dang / seng+ge khyim phub nas/ seng+ge rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur
232b8('dul ba): spyod par byed pa las bu mo cig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gos can zhes bya bar btag so// de ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ khye'u zhig bca' bar
233a1('dul ba): 'gyur te/ nges pa srog dang bral nas/ rang nyid cod pan bcings te/ rgyal srid byed par 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan to// de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ 
233a2('dul ba): dga' dgur spyod pa lngas bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ nye gos can zhes bya bar gtag so// de yang ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ bu
233a3('dul ba): mtshan rdzogs pa zhig bca' bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan to// sa sbyong gdug pa rtsal che ba zhig pa langs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi bskyed mas chal rnams ma rung bar byas
233a4('dul ba): pa dang / bskyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa~M bri rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po chen yi na gyis/ de dag gi bskyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar ma
233a5('dul ba): bya shig ces des slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas/ bskyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyis mi li tsa byi rnams kyi
233a6('dul ba): bskyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/ li tsa byi 'di dag ni gdugs pa rtsal po che yin pas/ 'di la gnod pa bya su 'ong gis/ 'di slar bzlog shig/ des de bkug nas smras
233a7('dul ba): pa bu yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas/ 'di dag gi bskyed mos tshal ma rung bar ma bya shig/ de dag gis gnod pa byas sa re/ de smras pa/ yab 'di
233a8('dul ba): dag la ni bskyed mos tshal mchis na/ bdag cag la ma mchi so// des smras pa/ bu bskyed mos tshal gyi don du tshogs la gsol ba gang po// des tshogs la gsol ba bta'o// 
233b1('dul ba): shes ldan dag bdag gi bu gnyis la bskyed mos tshal ma mchis kyis/ bdag la bskyed mos tshal cig thugs dpag mdzad pa'i rig so// de rnams kyis de dag la bskyed mos tshal rnying
233b2('dul ba): pa pa zhig byin pa las/ de na shing sa la chen po zhig yod/ de la gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan byed bcugo/ gcig shos kyis ni zhal sres bya'o// de bzhin
233b3('dul ba): du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa cen na/ sa skyong dang / seng+ge'i shing sa la'i tshal na bzhug so zhes brjod// 
233b4('dul ba): sa skyong gis bya ba ma yin pa stong phrag dge byas pas/ liHbyi rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed// de nas dum bus bkug ste bsgo ba/ bu khyod chog
233b5('dul ba): 'khrug par ma byed par/ ri bor che ge mo zhig tu song la/ de rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed ci nga 'dug shig/ de der song nas rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha'
233b6('dul ba): rnams la zhal ta bya bar brtsam so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas/ de rnams kyis blon po'i tshig dum ngur sde dpon du bcug pa las/ des kyang
233b7('dul ba): thung ngu zhig tu chos dang 'thun pas sde dpon byas nas shi'o// yangs pa can gyi tshogs 'dus nas/ su zhig sde dpon du gzhug ces byas pa dang / de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ blon
233b8('dul ba): mchog dum bus tshogs yongasu bskyangs pas na de nyid kyi bu gzhu bo// kha cig gis smras pa/ de'i bu sa skyong ni gdug pa/ rtsal po che zhig ste/ gal te sde dpon du cug na/ gdon mi
234a1('dul ba): za bar tshogs phye bar 'gyur// de'i nu bos ng+ge gang yin pa don nges pa/ 'grogs na dad ba/ tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa dag pas/ gal te tshogs 'a
234a2('dul ba): sde dpon du bzhu 'o// thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas seng+ge'i gan du song ste/ seng+ge khyod la sde dpon sbyino// des smras pa/ skyong ni bdag gi phu bo yin pas de sde dpon du rub
234a3('dul ba): theg/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ sang+ge sde dpon khyod kyi rigs brgyud kyi ril pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci/ tshogs gang la 'drang ba des sde dpon bya bar zad mod/ gal te khyod mi 'ja
234a4('dul ba): na kho bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde dpon du bzhug/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor na/ de ni ma 'os pas yi ge bku ro snyam nas des khas blangs
234a5('dul ba): nga dang / de rnams kyis bkur bsti chen pos sde dpon du bcu go/ langs pa can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spyang ba de la dus bu la sogs pa tshags kyis bka' stsal
234a6('dul ba): pa zhes 'dri ba las/ gang gi tshe seng+ge sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe/ seng+ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri bar bya'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ri 'or nas skye
234a7('dul ba): rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i ri 'or gang yin pa der spring ba 'ongs pa dang / sa skyong gis phye ste klags nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni langs
234a8('dul ba): can gyis tshogs dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'drin/ da ni sing+ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis dka' stsal pa zhes 'drin/ ci kho bo'i ba shi 'am/ de rnams
234b1('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ shi'o// de mi bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song ste smras pa/ phu bo nga 'dug bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba cig rigs sam/ seng+ges ji ltar gyur pa de la smras pa
234b2('dul ba): dang / nga yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas bsams pa/ bdag la yangs pa can rnams kyis bkur bsti ma yin pa byas kyis/ rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o/ 
234b3('dul ba): snyam nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bdag lho'i btsan pag na mchis par 'tsha lo zhes po nya btangango // des de la spring ba/ 'ong ba legs kyis shog shig ces spring ba
234b4('dul ba): de rgyal po'i khang du 'ongs pa dang / de nas rgyal po gzug sa can snying pos blon po'i mchog tu bcug/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying
234b5('dul ba): po'i btsun mo dam pa ki nas/ de 'gram pa lag pa gtang / sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa des skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du zhal la phyag bta de/ thug
234b6('dul ba): mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na/ ci'i phyir sems khongasu chud cing mi 'dug/ lha thong thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag gi nu pa la bu mo
234b7('dul ba): gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/ lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis mchis na/ de la gcig la ni pha 'gum pa'i bu gcig btsa' bar 'gyur/ gcig shos la ni mtshan
234b8('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa cig btsa' bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan na/ lha'i che du de gang khrid mchi/ bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa btsa' bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa gang
235a1('dul ba): yin pa de'o// de nas sa skyong gis side la spring ba/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mongam pa shi nas/ khyod kyi nye gos can tshur skyes shig dang / btsun mo
235a2('dul ba): dam par 'gyur ro// des de la yi ge lan spring ba/ gar bskor kyang khyod kho na la bdag 'dri bar zad kyi/ khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma'i mchi ba yin pas khyod nyid shes
235a3('dul ba): ji ltar tshogs kyis khrimasu bcas pa/ yangs pa can las gzhan du bu mo mo btang nas bcas mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod nyid 'os te/ bskyed mos tshal du sdod cid dang // kha bas
235a4('dul ba): bskyed mos tshal du phyung dang / khyod kyis gling song shig/ de nas sa skyong gis rgyal po la mchi phyag byas nas shing rta zhugs te/ yongs pa can du song ba las/ rim gyis
235a5('dul ba): phyin nas bskyed mos tshil du bsdad// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi sgo srungs zhig shi nas mi ma yin pa rnamasu skyes pad sa langs pa can rnams la bstan pa/ bdag ni mi
235a6('dul ba): ma yin pa rnamasu skyes kyis/ bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la/ mgul bar dril spyongs shig dang / gal te yangs pa can rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' shig 'ongs na/ dang / 
235a7('dul ba): gis ji tsam du zin pa 'am/ 'bros par gyur pa srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrags par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnang sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan byas nas mgul pa la dri btags te/ gar da
235a8('dul ba): glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gtor ma dang / me tog phreng yi byad kyis sgo khang du bzhag/ sa skyong gis seng+ge la spring pa/ kho bo bskyed mos tshal na sdod kyis byung shig/ des yangs pa can
235b1('dul ba): gyi tshogs la brtags nas khyim du song ste/ nye gos can la smras pa/ khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po la byin gyis rgyan rnams thogs la/ bskyed mos tshal du byung shig/ 
235b2('dul ba): rgyan rnams 'dog par brtsams pa dang / gos can gyis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ ci zhig gi phyir rgyan rnams 'dogs/ kho mo bag mar btang // su zhig la/ rgyal po gzugs
235b3('dul ba): can snying po la'o// des smras pa/ kho mo phra mo yin na// khyod ci ste bag mar btang / gal te de ltar na khyod rgyan thogs shig/ de yang smra ba las dril gyi sgra byung // yangs pa can
235b4('dul ba): gyi tshogs rang rang bar gyur te/ bdag cag gi mi 'ja' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhug so// seng+ge dngas pas nye gos can yin snyam nas/ gos can khrid myur po myur bar phyir byung ba
235b5('dul ba): dang sa skyong yang dngas pas/ gos can shing rtar bcug ste song // yangs po can gyi tshogs kyis phyi bzhin bsnyabs nas/ de dang de rnamasu lhan cig 'thab par brtsam
235b6('dul ba): pa dang / de gnas lnga rnams la byang ba yin pas/ des li tsa byi lnga brgya'i gan du bsnun nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas khyod cag las lnga ngargya gnang du bsnun zin gyis/ 
235b7('dul ba): lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyis slar deng shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ngeng cag las sems can gcig kyang bsad pa med// go phud cig/ de rnams kyis go phung pa dang / lnga
235b8('dul ba): ngargyas la 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur tote// de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni srin po yin snyam nas skrag ste briso// las pa can du lhags nas gros bya bar brtsams pa
236a1('dul ba): ldan dag bdag cag dbu la gzugs na snying po'i bu rnams lan klon du gzhug kyis glegs bu la yi ger bris te sgrom bur bcug nas/ rgya slebs la rgyas
236a2('dul ba): bdab nas bzhago zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas bzhago// sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas smras pa/ nyi gos can phongs shig/ des smras pa/ 
236a3('dul ba): khu bu bdag ni nye gos can ma lags te/ bdag ni gos can lags// khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma smras/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug/ de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi
236a4('dul ba): bde bas/ rgyal po drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ sa skyong 'das sam/ 'ongs pa leg so// lha bdag mchis lagaso// nye gos canar khrid 'ongs sam/ lha khrir
236a5('dul ba): kyang mchis la/ khrid ma mchis kyang mchi so// ci zhig zer/ nye gos can lags snyam nas/ gos can khrid mchi so// bltas khrid shog shog/ de nang du khrid pa dang / rgyal po
236a6('dul ba): lhag par yang gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ bud med kyi yul gyis phrogs pas mthong ma thag kho nar/ rgyal po chags par gyur nas smras pa/ 
236a7('dul ba): shes ldan dag bu pa gsod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas gal te nga la bu yod par gyur na/ de btsas ma thag tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o// / 
236a8('dul ba): de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pa na/ lus 'phags ma zhes bya bar grag so// da de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dag
236b1('dul ba): bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed// re shig dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po ri dwags kyi phyir byung ba na bsti gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa ldang
236b2('dul ba): ldan pa zhig gnaso// ji tsam na ri drags mda'i long la btags pas skrag pa zhig/ drang srang de'i bsti gan su bzhugs shing 'byung ba rgyal po'i mangs gan du bsnun to// de nas
236b3('dul ba): drang srong de khro nas smras pa/ 'thab grol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti gnas gcan bzan gdug pas kyang gzem par bya ba ra/ ri dwags skyabasu 'ongs pa khyod kyis
236b4('dul ba): bsad dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po la de skad ba zer dang nga / dpung ga tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa/ lha 'di su la g.yar mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa/ nga la yin
236b5('dul ba): na shes ldan dag/ rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin ba de la chad pa ci yod/ lha de'i chad pa dgum pa lag so// gal te de ltar na ngas drang srong nga yongasu spang so// 
236b6('dul ba): gsad par brtsams te/ de gsod pa na smon lam log par btab pa/ rgyal po 'thab krol can 'dis bdag nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa bsad par sgris pa gang
236b7('dul ba): du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig/ yang bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di dag ni shin tu sbas pa/ shin tu srungs pa/ shin tu btsas pa yin pas/ gel te
236b8('dul ba): du smras pa blangs na lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du smon lam 'angs bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur cig cas ngas
237a1('dul ba): das sngon lam log par ba bar gos can gyi mangs du skyes// gang gnyi mkhon panyid ma cha ba sbyor bzungs pa nyid kyinyam pa khrag gi ra bag
237a2('dul ba): can 'dod pa skyes pa/ e ma'o bdag gis lha'i rgyab kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing zos kyang ci ma rung snya mo// de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams
237a3('dul ba): bkug nas rmas pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni btsun mo'i rum du sen zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lag so// rgyal po sems khongasu chud de 'dug nas
237a4('dul ba): 'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig sel bar 'gyur snya mo// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha ras kyi bar rtsang bltam par bgyis te/ gsol la/ nyid btsun mo la sto
237a5('dul ba): mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal pos ras kyi bar shas gang bar byas pa bgos nas/ bdag nyid gos can la bsta bas pa dang / des rgyab kyi sha yin snyam nas zos/ 
237a6('dul ba): nas de'i 'dong ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// yang de 'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o bdag gis lha'i khrag kho na 'thungs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras
237a7('dul ba): pa dang / de nas rgyal pos yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar nas khrag brud pas/ de 'dod pa de dang lang dral bar gyur to// ji tsam na zla ba dbu tshang ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ ma
237a8('dul ba): pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsa so// btsas te gang gis nyi ma la bcas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la yang khrag gi char ba'o// rgyal bas yang ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas rmas pa
237b1('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan bcos las ji ltar gda' ba ltar na/ gdon ma 'tshal bar khye'u 'dis lha sku tshe dang phral nas/ rang nyid cong pan bcings te/ rgyal sringad bgyid
237b2('dul ba): par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyal srid kyi che du 'dis srog dang bral bar byed kyis/ 'di la bdag nyid kyis rgyal srid byin na ci'i phyir bdag srob
237b3('dul ba): dang bral bar byed snyamo// de'i tshe yangs pa can na li tsa byi ming chen zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i bskyed mos tshal na/ a sma'i tshal yod pa las/ der glo bur du chu shing gi sdong
237b4('dul ba): po zhig skyes pa/ kun dga'i ra ba srung bas mthong // dam thag kho nar me tog chags pa dang / de ngo mtshar skye sa nas ming chen la smras pa dang / des ltas mkhan
237b5('dul ba): rnams bkug nas dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de bsrung du gsol cig dang / dpung bdun gyi nyen par gos la par 'gyur te/ de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar
237b6('dul ba): 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ming chen gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/ bskyed mos tshal der kun nas srungs ma'i mi rnams bkod nas/ nyi ma 'grang ba la
237b7('dul ba): zhug so// ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / bskyed mos tshal de rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i
237b8('dul ba): phog pog dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po bres/ me tog sil mas bkram/ glu dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams pa du ma dag dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen bshes kyi skye bas ra
238a1('dul ba): su bskor nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos/ chung ma dang lhan cig byung nas/ bskyes mos tshal de na/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed// dga' dgur spyod pa byed
238a2('dul ba): pa las/ chu shing gi sdong po granas/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung // de nas ming chen gyis chung ma ngom pa la
238a3('dul ba): gtang ba dang / des smras pa/ lha 'di'i ming gdags su gsol/ ming chen gyi smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pas/ 'di'i ming a mra skyong ma zhes bya'o// ji tsam
238a4('dul ba): na khyim bdag ming chen bskyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim du song ste/ bu mo a mra skyong ma bskyed bsrings te zhes bya ba nas/ chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du la
238a5('dul ba): de spong ba'i phyir yul krung krung ba rnams dang / shAkya rnams dang / gzhan yang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i rgyu la po dang / blon po'i bu dang / tshong pa dang / tshong dben
238a6('dul ba): dang / dad dpon du ma dag 'ongs pa dang / khyim bdag ming che na gyis bsams pa/ gang kho na la ma byin pa de kho na sdang bar 'gyur na/ 'on kyang tshogs kyi khrims
238a7('dul ba): bcas pa/ re shig tshogs la brtag snyam nas/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te/ shes ldan dag/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis bskyed mos tshal nas/ bu mo zhig
238a8('dul ba): rnyed pa de bdag gis bsnun// bstod/ bskyed nas/ de dag gis rang gi rigs brgyud dang 'tsham par/ 'ga' zhig la chung mar sbyin na/ tshogs kyis ltos shig/ de rnams
238b1('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim bdag sngon tshogs kho nas khrimasu bcas pa/ bud med rin po che mi btang ste/ tshogs kyi spyad zhes bcas pa yin gyis/ re shig bu mo de ci 'dra ba bltas/ khrid
238b2('dul ba): shog shig/ des de tshogs kyi nang du khrid 'ongs pa dang / gzugs dang / lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgra de/ kun du
238b3('dul ba): brtags par brtsams nas/ khyim bdag 'di ni/ bud med rin po che yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyis/ su la yang mi sbyin// de nas khyim bdag ming chen yid mi bde dang / 
238b4('dul ba): rang gi khyim du song nas/ de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad te sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa dang / a mra skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/ yab ci'i slang thugs mi
238b5('dul ba): dgyes/ bu mo khyod bud med rin po che yi no zhes tshogs kyis sprad par gyur te/ bdag gi yid la re ba ma rdzogs// yab ci khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur tam/ bu ma sngon
238b6('dul ba): tshogs kyis khrimasu bcas pa/ bud med rin po che ni tshogs kyis spyad zhes bcas la/ khyod kyang bud med rin po che yin pas/ de'i phyir bdag la dbang med// des smras pa/ 
238b7('dul ba): dam zhig bcas te gal te bdag la tshogs kyis dam pa lnga zhig sprul na/ bdag gis tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ ris dang por khang pa stsal pa dang / skyes pa gcig nang du
238b8('dul ba): zhugs pa na/ gcig shos nang du mi 'jug pa dang / nang du 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang ka ra sha pa na lnga brgya 'tshal te mchi ba dang / gang gi tshe khyim nyul ba de'i tshe/ bdag gi khyim
239a1('dul ba): zhag bdun na thul ba dang / bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag pa'o// ming chen gyis/ a mra skyong ma'i phrin paH
239a2('dul ba): pa dang / tshogs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du bya ste/ ris dang po'i khang pa zhes gang smras pa la ris dang po'i khang pa ni bud med rin po che kho na la 'oso// gcig nang du zhugs pa na/ gcig
239a3('dul ba): shes nang du mi 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ sha kho na rnams la ni/ 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi sha kho na tha chad yin pas/ gal te gcig nang du zhugs pa dang / gcig
239a4('dul ba): shos kyang nang du zhugs na/ gdon mi za bar gcig la cig gsod par 'gyu ro// nang du 'jug pa des ka ra sha pa na lnga brgya thogs te/ nang du 'jug par bya'o// zhes gang smras pa
239a5('dul ba): de'ang bden te/ gdon mi za bar de'i gros dang / rgyan du dgos// / zhag bdun lon na/ khang pa byul bar bya'o zhes smras pa/ de yang bden te/ sngar ram/ phyis byas kyang
239a6('dul ba): rung / de la 'gal ba tsa zhig yod/ skyes pa rnams phyir byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ 'di smad 'tshong ma'i yin pas/ gal te
239a7('dul ba): mi rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa brtags na/ su zhig de'i khyim du 'jug/ de nas tshogs kyis de la mchog lnga byin nas/ tshogs kyis spyad par gyur to// 
239a8('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi li tse byi rnams kyis/ dga' dgur spyad pa'i phyir/ de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de na kha cig ni yul la chags ches pa'i phyir/ mthong ma thag
239b1('dul ba): kho nar 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur to// kha cig gis ni reg pa kho nas te/ de la 'gas kyang skyes pa'i bya ba ma byaso// des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni skyes pa ma yin gyis/ thabs
239b2('dul ba): shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas/ des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gang na rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ phyug po
239b3('dul ba): 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ tshong pa 'am/ ded dpon ci 'dra ba zhig mthong ba de 'dra ba/ dag rtsig pa la dris shig/ de rnams kyis ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bris pa dang / de nas a mra
239b4('dul ba): skyong ma rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas/ ri mo'i las rnam sa la so sor brtags te/ dris pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'di dag ni gang zhig/ 'di dag ni rgyal po rab snang / 
239b5('dul ba): gzhan 'di gang zhig/ ko sa li'i rgyal po gsal rgyal// gzhan 'di gang zhig/ pad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/ gzhan 'di gang zhig/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
239b6('dul ba): gzugs can snying po'o// des de bzhin dris pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang thams cad smraso// de nas des thams cad la brtags pa dang / gzugs can snying po la mig chags
239b7('dul ba): nas/ des bsams pa/ skyes bu 'di lta bur chu zheng gab pas ni/ bdag dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad par nus snyam// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bza
239b8('dul ba): sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir sang nas/ blon po'i tshigs kyis yongasu bskor te 'dug nas/ tshul ma yin pa'i gtam smras pa/ shes ldan
240a1('dul ba): dag sus smad 'tshong ma ji lta bu mthong / sa skyong gis smras pa/ lha re shig gzhan lta zhog la/ yangs pa can na smad 'tshong pa a pra skyong ma zhes pagyi
240a2('dul ba): ba shin tu gzugs dang / lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi 'tshal ba/ lha kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchi so// des smras pa/ sa skyong gal te de lta na
240a3('dul ba): yang ba can du dang / de dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod // des smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni yun rang po nas gnod pa bgyid pa/ slar rgol po/ dgra bo lags pa/ 
240a4('dul ba): khyod la gnod pa bgyis su mchi'o// rgyal pos smyos pa/ shes ldan dag/ mi rnams ni skyes bu'i dpa' snying can yin pas 'drang ngo // des smras pa/ lhagal te ngan ma mchis
240a5('dul ba): pa la/ gtsigs chen mdzad na gshegs mdo de shing rtar zhugs nas sa skyong dang / lhan cig yangs pa can du chas te/ rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas/ sa skyong
240a6('dul ba): ni bskyed mos tshal na sdod// rgyal po ni a mra skyong ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na dril gyi sgra byung // yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ring rong por gyur nas
240a7('dul ba): shes ldan dag bdag cag gi mi 'dza' ba zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo zhes sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po byung ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ a smra skyong
240a8('dul ba): ma la dris pa/ bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/ lha sdum par nyul bar bgyid// ci zhig gi phyir/ lha'i spangu'o// ji ltar bya/ ci 'bros sam/ lha mi dgyes par ma mdzad cig/ 
240b1('dul ba): dgung bdun lon dang / bdag gi sdum pa nyul bar bgyid pas/ re shig dgung bdun du rol pas dgyes par mdzod/ dgyes dgur mdzod la/ dgung bdun lags dang / dus mkhyen
240b2('dul ba): bar bgyi'o// de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ ji tsam na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ des rgyal po gzugs
240b3('dul ba): can snying po la smras pa/ lha bdag la sems can zhugs lagaso// de la song ras cig dang / sor gdub brgya byin nas smras pa/ gal te bu mo zhig yin na khyad nyid kyi yin// 'on
240b4('dul ba): te khye'u yin na/ seng ras 'di bskon la/ sor gdub kyi rgya mgul du thogs te/ de'i drung du skra shig/ de byung ste shing rtar zhugs te/ sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang
240b5('dul ba): dril bu mi 'khril bar 'dug/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ sa ldan dag dgra bo byung gis/ rjes bzhin btsa la zhes li tsa byi sbyin 'khor gyi mda' rtsibs can lnga
240b6('dul ba): brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyi bzhin bsnyegs pa dang / sa skyong gis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ lha yangs pa can gyi li tsa bya rnams mchi na/ lha ci 'di dag dang ldan
240b7('dul ba): cig thab mo bgyi 'am/ 'on te shing rta brda'/ des smras pa/ nga ni dub pas shing rta nged kyis/ khyod kho nas 'di dag dang lhan cig thab mo khye shig/ des de rnams dang ldan cing
240b8('dul ba): 'thab mo 'gyed par btsams pa las/ langs pa can rnams kyis ngo shes nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi'i srin po de nyid 'di yin gyis/ slar log go// de
241a1('dul ba): rnams slar log nas/ yangs pa can du 'ongs te/ 'dus nas yang khrims bcas pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra 'di la yang gzugs can snying
241a2('dul ba): bu rnams sha klon du gzhug go zhes bcaso// ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / a mra skyong ma la khye'u gzugs bzang po/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsa so// btsas nas
241a3('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/ bsrangs bskyed de chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de yangs po can gyi lo tse bya'i khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis mi
241a4('dul ba): dga' ba'i tshig smras pa/ bran mo'i khye'u khyod brgya stong phra ga du ma zhig las ni skyes na/ pha su yin/ des dus nas/ ma'i drung du song ba dang / des smras pa/ bu ci'i phyir
241a5('dul ba): du/ des thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang / bu gal te yang dris dang / nga'i pa lta bu no khyed cag gcig la yang med zhes smros shig/ gal te su yin zhes smras pa/ 
241a6('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin zhes smras shig/ ji tsam na de de rnams dang lhan cig yang rje bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis de la de bzhin du smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 
241a7('dul ba): pha lta bu na khyed cag gcig la yang med do// su yin/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no// de rnams kyis shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra gang yin pa de ni 'di'i bo yin zhes
241a8('dul ba): lhag pa yang brdeg so// des ngus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la smras pa dang / des bsams pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byaM rnams ni gdug pa tsal po che lan te/ gal te
241b1('dul ba): 'di bsad par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod snya mo// de de lta bu sems shing 'dug pa dang / tshong pa rab tu mang po zong thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dod pa de dag des mthong nas smras
241b2('dul ba): pa/ sor gtub kyi rgyu 'dis snod rgyal thob la deng shig dang / sho gam mi gcod par 'gyuraro// khye'u 'di yang rgyal po'i bro brang du khrid la/ sor gtub kyi rgya 'di 'di'i mgul du
241b3('dul ba): thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor zhog shig/ de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangaso// bu la yang mu tig gi do shal zhig byin nas smras pa/ bu rgyal po dgo
241b4('dul ba): pa'i tshe du 'dus dang / mu tig gi do shal rkang pa'i steng du zhog la 'dzegs te pang du 'dug shig/ gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes pa zhig zhes smras pa dang / de la bu
241b5('dul ba): pas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam zhes som shig/ de tshe nga ba rnams dang lhan cig tu rim gyis rgyal po'i kha ba tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis khrus byas te/ so
241b6('dul ba): gdub kyi rgya btags nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor bzhag pa dang / de rgyal po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas mu tig gi do shal rkang pa la bzhag nas 'dzegs te pang du 'dug/ 
241b7('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khye'u 'di ni 'jigs mi shes pa zhigo/ des smras pa/ yab bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchis lags sam/ de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa med
241b8('dul ba): pa'i sgra kun du smras pas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med ces bya bar grags// / 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu gcig pa/ rgyal po bzugs
242a1('dul ba): can snying po gzhan gyi bud med la lhag par chags pas/ glang po che la zhon nas grong khyer gyi srang rnamasu song nas/ rig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyam
242a2('dul ba): byed do// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na/ tshang dpon phyug pa/ nor mang pa longs spyod che ba zhig yod pa ngas/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas shes bya ba nas/ dga' dgu
242a3('dul ba): spyod par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// des dus gzhan zhig na/ chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro'o// des smras pa/ rje'i sras
242a4('dul ba): de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de zong thogs te yul gyi mthar so ngo // de yang kha zas zhim pa dang / gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/ rgyal po gzugs
242a5('dul ba): can snying po glang po che la zhen nas/ de'i khyim drung nas song ba dang / des kyang skar khung du 'dug nas/ rgyal po la me tog gi phreng ba po// de nas rgyal pos mtha
242a6('dul ba): nas smras pa/ mar shog/ des smras pa/ lhag yar tsha lags kyis khyod nyid nang du gshegs shig/ de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas/ de de dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod pa
242a7('dul ba): byed pa las/ yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pas sems can chags par gyur nas/ des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de nas rgyal
242a8('dul ba): pos de la yang sor gdub kyi rgya dang / seng ras khra bo byin nas/ smras pa/ gal te re shig khye'ur gyur na seng ras 'di bskon la// sor gdub kyi rgyu yang mgul du thogs te
242b1('dul ba): nga'i drung du skri shig/ 'on te bu mo yin ni khyod nyid kyi yino zhes smras nas/ rgyal po song ngo // ji tsam na ded dpon de don rnams grub ste/ rgyal po'i khab dang nye ba zhig tu phyin nas
242b2('dul ba): des chung ma la bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig/ kho bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te/ zhag 'di tsam kho na na phyin par 'ong ngo // spring pa des thos nas/ bdag gis ni bya ba ma yin
242b3('dul ba): ba 'di lta bu byas la/ de yang 'ong na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du 'phongs par gyur nas/ des de ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rigs par byas pa dang / de nas rgyal pos
242b4('dul ba): slar sprid pa/ bag mche bar 'dug shig/ ji nas kyang myur du ni 'ongs pa de sngar ngas bya'o// rgyal pos de la pho nya btang ba// deng dpon nga la rin po che tshi ge ma dang / che ge mongs
242b5('dul ba): cig dgos kyis de med par khyod 'dir ma 'ongs shig/ de rin po ched rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song // de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas btsas pa dang / khye'u ba
242b6('dul ba): bzang po mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsa so// ma bslab sa kyang bud med la shes nyen yod pas/ des mar dang sbrang rtsis de 'drangs par bstod nas sor bdud kyi rgyu
242b7('dul ba): mgul du btags te/ sang ras kyis dkris nas/ sgrom bu'i nang du bcug ste/ bu mo mngag zhug ma la bsgo ba/ song la sgrol bu 'di khyer te rgyal po'i pheM brang gi sgor khyed kyis
242b8('dul ba): dkyil 'khor byos la me mar bus te phyogs gcig tu ji srid 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du sdod cig/ des de bzhin du byas pa dang ji tsam na rgyal po steng gi khang badz+ra
243a1('dul ba): / kyis bzhir song nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med dang ldan cig 'dus pa las des rgyal po pho brang gi skor par me mthong / de ras sogs 'tsho bdag la sgeb
243a2('dul ba): ldan dag rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo ra/ mar po 'bar ba 'o di tsaM ya~Mn ltos shig/ deng dag gis bltas nas smras pa/ lnga sgrom bu zhib mchis so// des sbas pa/ long shig/ rgyal bu gare'u 'jigs
243a3('dul ba): nged kyis spros pa/ lnga sgrob bu ma ma mchis de bdag la stsal bar cig dang / rgyal pos de bzhin du bya'o zhes las blang so// ji sa man slob bu drangs nas rgyal po la phul ba dang / rgya los
243a4('dul ba): smras pa/ kha che shig/ 'phye nga las khye'u zhig byu'o// rgya la pos smras pa/ 'di cig so nga po/ 'on te shi ba zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gson lag so// nga nas rgyal pos
243a5('dul ba): sor gdub kyi rgyu dang / seng ras ngo shes nas/ rgyal bu gan nan 'jigs med la byin pa dang / des de bstan bstod bskrad do// rgyal pos gsor nam zhes rig tu byung ba dang / rgyal
243a6('dul ba): bu gzhor ru 'jigs med kyis gsos pas 'jo byed gzhon nus gsos zhes bya bar grag so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos chen por gyur to// 'jigs med dang
243a7('dul ba): lhan cig dri mo gtam zer zhing 'khod pa/ 'jigs med gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ni ma bcas pa khong nas rgyal po nyidu lung bstan gyis bdag cig ni brngo chung zad bslabs te/ de na bdag
243a8('dul ba): cag gi phyi dus kyi 'tsho bar 'gyu ro// de gnyis kyis de ltar gres byas pa las/ shing lta mkhan gos dkar po gon pa mi gos dkar po gyon pa rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ rgyal
243b1('dul ba): po'i pho brang du zhugs pa dang / de rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med des mthong bas des rgyal bu'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa 'di su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shing rta mkhan lagaso// / 
243b2('dul ba): 'di ci 'thob/ 'tsho ba'o// des bsams pa/ bdag gis kyang lha la brtags nas/ shing rta mkhan bslab po snyam nas de rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag kyang shing rta
243b3('dul ba): mkhan bslab po// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod ci 'dis 'tsho bar 'gyur ram/ yab rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lag so// bu gal te de lta na khyod shing
243b4('dul ba): mkhan slob shig/ des bslab par brtsam so// 'tsho byed kyis kyang sman pa gos dkar po gon pa/ mi gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs
243b5('dul ba): par mthong nas/ des gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ sman pa lagaso// de ci zhig byed/ dpyad bgyid// ci thob gal te/ rang pa
243b6('dul ba): zhig so san rngan pa 'thob bo// 'on te gur na mchil mi 'dri'o// ngas bsams pa/ sman dpyad bslabo snyam nas/ de pa'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lhaganang bar mdzod cig/ sman dpyang
243b7('dul ba): bslab lags// bu khyod rgyal po'i sras yin no// khyod la sman dpyad kyis ci bya/ lha rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad bslab par bgyi ba leg so// bu gal te de ltar spobs shig/ nga sngan
243b8('dul ba): dpyad bslang par brtsams pa dang / des sman dpyang na longs na/ des klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad ma shes nas/ des rdo 'jog na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba yod/ des
244a1('dul ba): klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyang sheso zhes thos nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha rdo 'jog tu mchi'o// ci zhig gi phyir/ don sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi
244a2('dul ba): bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyang 'tshal bar de slob du mchi'o// bu khyod 'dis 'tsho'am/ lha yang na ni slar dpyang mi bslab/ yanga? ra ni legs par bslab
244a3('dul ba): bgyi'o// bu gal te de lta na song shig/ des rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po la sprid pa/ bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyang slob tu rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ong gis/ 'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyi
244a4('dul ba): sbyor cig/ de rim gyis rnga 'dzag tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i snying pos kyang spring yig blags te rgyun shes kyi bu la gtad nas rgyal po'i bu 'di khyod kyi drung du re du 'os kyis 'di la
244a5('dul ba): sman dpyang spobs shig/ rgyun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed/ ban/ des cung zad bstan pa dang / 'tsho byed khyad par nga bcas par rdzob bo// rgyu ni shes kyi bu'i kun tu smra
244a6('dul ba): pani gang gi che/ nad pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ bram ze'i khye'u gcig khrid de 'gro ba yin pas/ de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid song nas/ des nad pa'i sman bstan pa 'di dang / 'a
244a7('dul ba): ngag byin cig ces smras nas byung // 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni mkhan pos nyes te/ gal te 'dis sman 'di zos na 'di deng nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/ mkhan pos bstan pa ni
244a8('dul ba): legs pa yir gyis/ thabs shig bya'o snyam nas/ de rgyun shes kyi bu dang / lhan cig tu byung nas slar nang du zhugs te smras pa/ mkhan po 'di skad ces gsung // ngo ngos sman bstan
244b1('dul ba): pagang yin pa de ma byin par 'di dang 'di dag byin cig/ des de bzhin du byas pas sos par gyur to// ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la rgyun shes kyis bu yang de'i drung du song nas dris pa/ rang ji
244b2('dul ba): ltar sos par gyur to// sang yang de nyid byin cig/ ci snga ma lags sam/ 'on te slad kyis bstan pa lags/ ci bdag gis sngar bston tam/ 'on te phyis bstan/ de dag gis smras pa 'di
244b3('dul ba): dag ni khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan to// 'di ni 'tsho byed la 'bring du sprid pa yin// des bsams pa bdag gis nyes kyi 'tsho byed ni shes rang car yin snyam bsams nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed
244b4('dul ba): kyis bstan pa gang yin pa de byin cig/ rgyun shes kyis bu 'tsho byed la dga' ba skyes pas/ de gang du 'gro ba der 'tsho byang khrid// bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan
244b5('dul ba): po khyod rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas 'di la ni spro bar ston par mdza dkyi bdag cag la ni mi mdzad// des smras pa/ 'tsho bya da ni shes rab can yin pas ngas bstan pa gang yin pa
244b6('dul ba): da rang gis rnam par 'byed nus kyi khyod kyis ni de lta ma yino// de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan pos ji ltar mkhyen gal te de lta na ngas khyed cag gi mngon sum du bya'o// bram ze'i khye'u
244b7('dul ba): rnams la khyod kyis ni rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin dris shig/ khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi 'o zhes thams cad tshong ngus bang ngo // 'tsho byad kyang khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes bsgo
244b8('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u dag gis ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin byas// 'tsho byed kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin byas nas bsams pa/ gal te mkhan po rjes gzhan gyi rin 'dri bar byed na/ bdag gi
245a1('dul ba): ji skad brjod par byas/ thams cad tu rdzas thams cad kyi rin dri'o snyam nas/ de dag thaMd mkhan po'i drung du song nas/ ji skad bstan pa bzhir smra so// rgyur shes kyi bus pa
245a2('dul ba): bstan pa'i rdzas kyi rin dri'o// brang ze'i khye'u rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin ji tsam/ des smras pa ma 'tshal to// gzhan dag la dris pa dang / smras pa ma 'tshal lags// 'tsho byed la dris pa dang / 
245a3('dul ba): ngas rdzas thams cad kyi rin smra so// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyod kyis thos sam/ thos lag so// ngas 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin cung zad bstan na yang de la
245a4('dul ba): rang gis rnam par 'byeng nus zhes smras pa ni don de yin// ga zhan yang mngon sum du bya'o zhes des de rnams la smras pa thang shing can gyi ri la deng la sman pa yin nga ngag khyer de shig
245a5('dul ba): shig/ de dag dong nas de dag las gang zhig gis gang sman ma yin par shes pa de dag gis bla so// 'tsho byed kyis bsam+ba pa/ sman ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang yongasnyam nas/ ngas
245a6('dul ba): 'dam bu mnga' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo ba'i dum bu zhig blangaso// ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis lam gyi phyed na/ phyugs rdzi mo zhag zho'i bum pa dang bral chung khyer nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ba lnga
245a7('dul ba): de shin tu mig ni nga des mthong nas des dris pa gang du 'gro ba/ des smras pa dang / des de la gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i sman zhig bstan pa las/ nges byas pa dang / mod la sos par gyur to// 
245a8('dul ba): dga' ba skyes nas smras pa/ zho'i bum pa dang phrum chud 'di khyod snoms shig des phrum tshud blangs te zho'i bum pa ni de nyid la byin nas/ de phrum tshung khyer te song ba las ji tsam na bram
245b1('dul ba): ze'i khye'u rnams kyis lam gyis dbus na/ glang po che'i rjes zhig mthong nas de rnams kyis de la brtag par brtsams pa dang / 'tsho byed kyang 'ongs nas des smras pa/ 'di ci yin/ glang
245b2('dul ba): po che'i rjeso// 'di ni glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyis 'di ni nga lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba de ring kho nar glang po'i phru gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la
245b3('dul ba): zhon pa ni bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar bsdum pa/ de ring nyid du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhig yin no// ji tsam na rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ongs nas/ gang gis gang khya
245b4('dul ba): te 'angs pa des de bstan to// rgyun shes kyis bus smras pa/ drim ze'i khye'u dag 'di thams cad ni sman yin te/ re shig 'di ni cho ga che ge mo zhig gis nad che ge mo nag yin la de bzhin
245b5('dul ba): gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang yin// 'tsho byed la dris pa khyod kyis ci khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa mkhan po thams cad sman lags te sman ma lags pa ni ci yang ma mchi sa/ 
245b6('dul ba): 'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu mnga' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo'i dum bu sa dang phrum tshud cig 'tshal te mchi so// 'di dag cig dgos sdig pas zin pa la 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas
245b7('dul ba): bdug/ phrum tshud kyis ni glan par bgyi'o// rdo'i dum bus ni ston dka'i dus na zho'i bum pa 'chags par 'gyur ro// rgyun shes kyi bu 'dzum phyung ba dang / bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis
245b8('dul ba): bsams pa/ mkhan po ni 'di la khris snyam nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po ci 'di gcig pur ngas snyam pa ma~M/ bdag cag mchi ban lam gyi dbus glang ba che'i rjes shig
246a1('dul ba): mthong ba na 'di'i mchis nas 'di ni b.lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba la sbrum pa de ring kho nar glang po'i phru gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ 
246a2('dul ba): de la gzhon pa ni bud med yin la de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring nyi du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// rgyun shes kyi bus dris pa 'tsho byed bden nam/ mkhan po mdo// 
246a3('dul ba): de glang ngo che'i rjes sam pa lang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes/ des smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa lags na/ ji ste ma 'tshal glang po che'i rjes ni
246a4('dul ba): zla mo kha lang mo'i rjes ni chur ring // mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyog su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa lag so// sbrum par ji ltar shes/ rkang pa gnyis gnon cing
246a5('dul ba): mchi ba lag so// deng kho nar 'bral bar 'gyur ba ji ltar/ sa/ gcin be'u snabs dang bcas par 'byung bas/ glang po che'i phru gu por 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar
246a6('dul ba): shes rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par gnon cing mchi ba so// de la bud med zhon par ji ltar shes/ babs nas rkang pa'i bar du gces pa la so// de yang mig g.yas bzhar bar ji ltar
246a7('dul ba): shes/ g.yon phyogasu me tog thu zhing mchis paso// de yang sbrum par ji ltar shes/ de'i rkang pa'i rting pa la tshar gnon cing mchis paso// deng kho nar btsa' bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes
246a8('dul ba): gcin ldan ldan dang bcas te 'byung ba laso// de lta lags kyis kyang gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na/ 'don pa gnas pa'i phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig mngag tu gsol
246b1('dul ba): des bram ze'i khye'u zhig btang ba dang 'tsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus bram ze'i khye 'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyod kyis
246b2('dul ba): thos sam/ 'tsho byed ni de 'dra bar shes rab can yin// 'tsho byed kyis klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad ma gtogs pa thams cad bslab so// ji tsam na mi zhig klang nad kyis thebs
246b3('dul ba): nas/ rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyun shes kyi bus bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ kye nang rje re shig de ring dang rkos la lci bdag sta gon gyis shig dang / sang bdag
246b4('dul ba): gis khyod kyi dpyad bya'o// 'tsho byed kyis thos nas de de'i phyi bzhin song ste/ kye nang rje bdag gis cung zad bslab sa pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni sems can la phan
246b5('dul ba): pa'i phyir len na bdag gis klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba ma bslab sa kyis/ khyod kyis bdag dben pa zhig tu zhog zhig dang // khyod kyis las ji ltar byed pa blta'o// des smras pa/ 
246b6('dul ba): de bzhin du bgyi'o// des de phyogs dbyen pa zhig tu bzhago/ de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas me de dong du bcug ste/ thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis thod pa phye nas des skam pas srog chags
246b7('dul ba): de blang bar brtsams pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ mkhan po bcu lum sum blang shig/ rigs kyi bu 'di dang nyid du 'bum par 'gyuraro// des smras pa/ 'tsho byed 'ongs sam/ smra
246b8('dul ba): pa/ mkhan po bdag mchiso// kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya/ mkhan po skam pa tsha bar mdzod/ rgyab tu reg nas rkang lag 'khums par gyur pa dang / de nas 'or cig
247a1('dul ba): de des de bzhin du byas nas sos par gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ 'tsho byed kho bo shin tu mgu bar gyur gyis/ khyod khrus byos la shog shig dang / klad pa'i
247a2('dul ba): pa dbye ba'i dpyad sbyin// des khrus byas nas 'ongs pa dang / des de la glid pa thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad byin nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag cag ni 'dis 'tsho ba yin gyis/ yul 'dir khyod kyis
247a3('dul ba): ma bya zhig mkhan po de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes 'tsho byed kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phyag byas nas/ rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po'i drung du song nas phyag byas nas/ bdag gis sman dpyang bslabs
247a4('dul ba): lags kyi mchi'o// de'i tshe rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po dang / mi mthun pa mtha' mkhob skya bseng zhes bya ba dag cig yo dang / des smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag dang mi mthun pa mtha' ma'o
247a5('dul ba): pa skya bseng zhes bya ba dag cig yod kyis 'di ltar khyod ni shes rab can nus pa yin pas/ re shig de bob la phyis song shig dang / de lta na bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi
247a6('dul ba): chu la byas par 'gyu ro// des de la khas blangs pa dang / de nas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te btang ba las/ de mtha' 'khob pa skya bseng de rnams phab nas/ gte'u bzung
247a7('dul ba): dbye blangs te/ slar bde bar 'ongs nas khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du rgyal po la phul ba dang de shin tu dga' nas/ de nyid la rje su yi rang ste des kyang rgyuni shes kyi bu la byi no// de nas 'tsho byed
247a8('dul ba): rim gyis grong khyer ba rang byed du phyin nas/ de nyi dbyar gnas te/ de na des 'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba'i bstan bcos bslangs nas grong khyer bzang byed nas chas pa da
247b1('dul ba): mi zhig shing khur khyer nas grong khyer du 'jug pa/ rus pa dang lpags pa'i lhag ma lus pa/ lus kun nas 'dzag pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas/ de la smras pa/ kye nang rje ci zhig gis gan+da
247b2('dul ba): skabs 'di lta bur gyur/ des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang mi shes na/ 'on kyang bdag gis shing khur 'angadi khyer nas/ bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabasu gyur to// de shing btag pa la
247b3('dul ba): byang ba yin pas smras pa/ kye nang rje ci shing khur 'di 'tshong ngam/ 'tshong ngo // rin ji tsam/ kar sha ba na lnga brgya'o// des de nyonas de nas bltas nas/ 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed
247b4('dul ba): pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu mthong nas/ de'i mthu ni 'di 'dra ste/ gang gi tshe nad pa'i mdun du bzhag pa de'i tshe/ mar me khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin du/ nad ji lta ba bzhin du snang // de rim gyi
247b5('dul ba): yul u dum wa rar phyin pa dang / de na mi bres 'jal ba zhig yod pa des bre bor gzhal nas/ bre mgol snun pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas smras pa/ kye nang rje ci'i phyir
247b6('dul ba): de ltar byed/ bdag gi klad pa lhag par g.ya'o// tshur shog blta'o zhes des de bskal nas klad pa bltas te/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis dbyung po thams cad dang bar byed pa'i nor bu de'i drang
247b7('dul ba): pa'i steng du bzhag pa dang / ji tsam na srin gyi med cig snangango // de nas des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyi klad pa la srin gyi med yod// des rkang pa gnyis la gtubs te smras pa/ bdag la
247b8('dul ba): dpyad mdzod cig/ des khas blangaso// 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ mkhan pos ji skad bstan 'di'i dpyad bya'o snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ kye nang rje res shig/ de ring dong rkos la
248a1('dul ba): bdag sta gon byos shig dang / sang dpyang bya'o// des rkang pa gnyis la gtuganas song // 'tsho byed kyis de'i phyir nyid los nas de dong du bcug ste klang pa'i thod pa
248a2('dul ba): dbye ba'i kyis/ klang pa'i thod pa phye nas skam pa tshangs srin gyi med kyi rgyu ba la reg par byas te des rkang lag 'khums pa dang / de nas des skam pas blangs te bor bas sos par gyur to// 
248a3('dul ba): rdol ka rag pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bkuro// de nas 'tsho byad yul ro hi ta ka zhes bya bar phyin pa dang / yul ro hi ta ka na khyim bdag cig la bskyed mos chal
248a4('dul ba): me ba dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa g.yo dang / de de la lhag par chags pa las gnas de nyid du mi ma yin pa rnam du smras// de'i bra ni khyim kyi dpon por gyur nas
248a5('dul ba): des bskyed mos tshal der srungs ma'i mi bzhag pa dang / de mi ma yin pa des pas do// gnyis pa gzhag pa dang de yang bsad nas khyim bdag gi bu des bskyed mos tshal de bar
248a6('dul ba): ji tsam na maM chu chus gang ba sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig bskyed mos tshal der song nas nub mo brang btab ste 'dug nas/ kye ma'o bdag ni mi ma yin pas bsad kyang ci ma rung snam
248a7('dul ba): ngade nyid 'tsho byed kyang nub mo brang btab ste 'dug/ ji tsam na mi ma yin pa des/ dmu chu can de bsdigs par brtsams pa dang / dmu chu'i nang de byung nas smras pa/ 'di bdag gis sngar bzung
248a8('dul ba): na ci'i phyir 'di bsdig khyod lar spu'i drang pas bdug pa dga' yang med pa lta/ des ni khyed dpag ched bcu gnyi su 'bros par 'gyur// des kyang sngar smras pa/ khyad la yang la phug gis pa
248b1('dul ba): bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags te sbyin pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ des ni khyod dum bu dus bur 'dzag par 'gyur// thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos nas de nang bar sngar langs te khyi
248b2('dul ba): bdag de'i drung du song nas smras pa/ khyim bdag bskyed mos tshal me tog dang 'bras bu dang chu phun sum tshogs pa ci'i phyir dor/ khyim bdag gis de la ji ltar gyur pa rnams spras pa dang / des
248b3('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim bdag ra spu'i dud pas bdugs shig dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tsha bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyu ro// khyim bdag gis ra spu'i dradwags pa dang / mi ma yin pa de dpag chad
248b4('dul ba): bcu gnyis su bros par gyur to// khyim bdag des kyang 'tsho byed la ka ra sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur// de nas 'tsho byed kyis dmu du car la dris
248b5('dul ba): pa nang rje khyod ci'i phyir mi ma yin pas gnas btab pa'i bskyed mos tshal du 'dug/ des de la ji ltar gyur pa ga smras pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ la phub pa sa bon
248b6('dul ba): mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags pa 'thungs shig dang / sos par 'gyu ro// des 'thungs ngas sos par gyur te/ mi des kyang 'jo byed la ka rag par lnga brla byi 'o// des de yang rgyu
248b7('dul ba): kyi bu la bskur// de nas 'tsha byed rim gyis bcos brlag du phyi nas/ bcom brlag gi phyi rol na shing zhig drung du ngal so zhing 'dug go// ji ltar na gyad kyis byang brdangs pas ngo rang bral
248b8('dul ba): rnams 'khrums nas de shi'o zhes phyi rol du phyung // shing de la yang bya rgod po phru gu dang bcas pa zhig 'dug pa las/ de la phru gu de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma sha byin cig/ des smras pa
249a1('dul ba): shag la yod/ de rnams kyis spras pa/ ma gyad kyis byad 'di brdabs te/ shi nas phyung ba yino// bu 'dir sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs na nges 'di thos par byed
249a2('dul ba): nga'i gnas de yod// 'di ci zhig gis sos par 'gyur/ gal te de'i nang grol rnams phye mas reg par byas na'o// de thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos// de nas de langs te ro drung du song nas
249a3('dul ba): dris pa shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ zad kyis kyang brdangs pas shi ba yino// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ zhog zhig dang / balnga'o// de rnams kyis bzhag pa dang / den
249a4('dul ba): 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu klad par bzhag nas brtags na/ ji tsam na nang grol rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas/ nges smug ma'i sbung
249a5('dul ba): bu phye ma blugs te/ khas bus pa dang / phye mas nang grol na mas la reg nas sos par gyur to// des kyang 'tsho byed la kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyud shes kyi
249a6('dul ba): bul bsku'o// bcom brlag na khyim dngag gcig yod pada'i chung ma gzugs dang lang tshe phun sum tshogs pa yin pas de de la lhag par chags shing 'dug pa las/ shi nas de nyid kyi
249a7('dul ba): mtshan gyi srin bur skyes par gyur to// de gang dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod pa de shi bar byed// de nas de dang 'ga' yang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par mi byed// des sman pa 'tsho byed der 'angs
249a8('dul ba): zhes thos nas/ de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag la dro nang mchis kyis dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byed kyis de mthong zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas/ chags pas smras pa/ dam zhig bca
249b1('dul ba): ste/ gal te bdag dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad pa lta na dpyad bya'o// des smras pa/ g.yar tsha lag so// des smras pa/ khyod kyi dpyad gzhan ni medado// bdag las pangs pa gzhan med pas nges
249b2('dul ba): khas blang so// de nas des sgren mor phyung ste/ bzo bcos byas nas mo mtshan gyi sgor sha'i dum bu zhig bzhags pa las/ de nas srin bu de la chags pa dang / des de blangs nas bor te sos par
249b3('dul ba): gyur de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par zhen pas brda' zhig byas pa dang / des rna ba gnyis bkag ste smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i sring mo dang 'dra ste/ khyod kyi dpyad de yin pas kho bos de
249b4('dul ba): ltar byas par zad// des kyang de la ka ra sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bsku ro// de nas 'tsho byed kyis rim gyis chu bo ya mun na'i 'grab du phyin pa dang / nges de
249b5('dul ba): na me re zhig yod pa de'i ting pa'i phyogs na/ rgyus pa'i pra nga yod pa nya rnams kyis drangs pa las de'i mig 'bye da pa dang / 'dzums pa bathong nas/ 'tsho byed kyis de thabs
249b6('dul ba): cad brtags te/ ji ltar rgyus pa dang longs ma la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel thabs ni de kho na ltar 'dug snyam nas de rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin pa dang / ji tsa par gyad kyis byang
249b7('dul ba): cig bral mos bsnun pas mig gi 'bras bu 'phags pa dang / 'tsho byed de'i drung du song nas/ nges bting ba'i rgyus pa'i dring nas drangs pa dang / slar chud par gyur to// des de la kar ba par
249b8('dul ba): lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byino// yangs pa can na ma zhig yod pa de'i rna bar srin gyi ming zhugs te/ dar de las phru gu bdun brgya byung bas nga rna ba'i nad kyis nye bar bya
250a1('dul ba): nas/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ sngar ni bdag gis mkhan pos bstan pas las byas kyis da ni rang gi blos las
250a2('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/ des mi la bsgo ba kye nang rje song la lo ma'i spyil po byos te ras sdong pos g.yogs la de'i 'og tu rnga zhig zhog ste sa yang drod par byas shig/ des ji skad bstan pa bzhin
250a3('dul ba): byaso/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis mi nges la bskal nas/ sa de chus chag chag btab nas de nas rnga brdungs pa dang / srin gyis med kyis dbyar gyis dus la bab bo snya pa ras phyir byung // de nas 'a
250a4('dul ba): byed kyis rna ba'i drung du sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa dang / de yang slar zhugs te phru gu rnams khrid de byung nas phru gu rnams dang lhan cig sha'i dum du la chags pa dang / de nas 'jo
250a5('dul ba): kyis nga'i mod la sha'i dum bu bor ba dang / mi de sos par gyur te// ngas kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang / nges 'jigs me dkyim la byano// derim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa
250a6('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'tsho byed ji ltar 'ongs pa thos nas/ des gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la bsgo ba/ bu khyod kyi bu pho 'ongs kyis spur song shig/ de sbyar song ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis ga
250a7('dul ba): nu ma skyes dgra ji ltar sngar 'ong ba thos nas/ des bsams pa gal te bdag gis de skye ba rang gir byas na ni/ nam rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ 
250a8('dul ba): slar log te sgo gzhan zhig nas zhug so// dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongasu bskor te/ sems g.yeng zhing song ba dang / ji tsam na bram ze zhig mog nad kyis the
250b1('dul ba): nas 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste/ bdag la slad ston cig/ tshig pa zos nas smras bral bas thob shig/ des drang po zhig pas/ thal bas btab pa dang sos par gyur to// mig nad kyis thebs
250b2('dul ba): pa gzhan zhig yod pa de yang 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ba bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/ kye nang rje gang du 'gro ba des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa dang / khyod la 'tshe byed ci dgos
250b3('dul ba): des kho bo la gang bstan pa de byos shig/ de yid ches par gyur nas des thal ba btab pa dang / long bar gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i spyi bor po la mig
250b4('dul ba): brupo// des blor po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag sman pa/ mas khug sheg/ blong po rnams kyis sman pa rnams pa sdug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga'i spu
250b5('dul ba): bol yig byung gis dpyad byos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha sman pa chen po 'tsho byed mchis ra/ bdag cag baM bgyin 'tshal/ rgyal pos spras pa/ shes lnga dag
250b6('dul ba): 'tsho byed khug shig/ de rnams kyis de dkrug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed dbang byos shig/ 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ lha dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te lha la bdag nyid kyis
250b7('dul ba): khrus bgyid du gnang na bgyi'o// de bzhin gyis shig/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis ske ru ros skud cing smin par gyur pa'i rdzas dag btab na smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang / bsres
250b8('dul ba): pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs te/ gang gi tshe smin pa de'i tshe na mtshor ba spu gris reg par byas pa dang rdol to// de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab nas 'tsho bar 'gyur
251a1('dul ba): ba'i rdzas rnams dang / bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang / rmang sos shing spags pa 'dra ba dang sgra yang mnyam par gyur to// rgyal po khrus byas ma thag
251a2('dul ba): tu smras pa/ 'tsho byed dpyad byos shig/ des smras pa/ lha re shig bshos gsol cig/ rgyal pos zan zos nas/ 'tsho byed dpyang byos shig/ lha bgyis lagaso// de yid pa ches
251a3('dul ba): nas lag pas byugs na phyogs gang na rma yod pa ma she so// me longs blangs te bltas na 'on kyang ma mthong ngo // btsun mo la dris na des kyang phyogs gang rarma yod pa pa sheso// rgya
251a4('dul ba): dza mchog tu ngo ma char skyes nas blon pa rnams la smras pa/ gas ldan dag 'tsho byeng sman pa'i rgyal po dbang bskur cig/ mi lang ba des spros pa/ lnga ci sras la byams pas sam
251a5('dul ba): 'or te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur ba mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sman mkhas paso// des smras pa/ gal te de lta lags na 'dis bdag ni ses par ma bgyis lags
251a6('dul ba): 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rdzi bdag gis khyod mthong yang ma mthong na sos par lta ga la byas/ des smras pa de ni med na/ 'on kyang khyod kyis gang la bstan pa des bdag la bstan pa
251a7('dul ba): ci zhig bstan/ che ge mo zhig go// 'tsha byad kyis smras pa/ de'i khams kyang bzhan la/ khyod kyi khams kyang gzhan yin gyis/ nga 'di dang 'di dag byos shig dang mos par 'gyur/ 
251a8('dul ba): ras byas nas sam par gyur pa dang / spras pa lha 'odi ldan pa'i rgyal po dbang bskur bar mdza du gsol// daglang ba che la zhan nas dpal gyi 'byor ba che dpos sman pa'i rgyal ba'i
251b1('dul ba): bskur to// rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa skran gyi nad gyis thebs nas sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa dang / des bsams pa/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du 'gro'o// gal te dbyung
251b2('dul ba): cig byas na ni de lta na legs/ gal te ma byas na bdag nyid 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/ de 'tsho byed kyi drung du song nas/ 'tsho byed bdag gi dpyad mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ kye na
251b3('dul ba): khyod kyi sman 'di ni rnyed par dka'o// des bsams pa/ 'tsho byed kyis kyang bdag spangs na/ 'di la ci byar yongs la bab kyis bdag ni 'chi'o snyam nas de dur khrod du song ngo // de na ro sreg
251b4('dul ba): pa'i me 'bar bar ne'u le gdug pa zhig dang / srog chags ge d+ha tsan dan zhes bya bar 'thabs te/ ltung ba dang / de bkres pas nyan pas de gnyis kar zos te/ lhas dur khrod
251b5('dul ba): char bab pa'i chu de 'thungs nas/ dur khrod dang ha cang ya nga mi rang ba zhig na gnag lhas yod pa der song ste/ ko dra'i chan dang mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs pas skur
251b6('dul ba): to// yar sngon mar 'khrus nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na lus 'phags ma'i mngoms kyi phyogasu phol mig byung // des rgyal po la smras pa dang / 
251b7('dul ba): bos 'tsho byed la bsgo ba/ ma yar mo'i dpyad gyis shig/ des khas blangs// de nas zan byas te ma ma la byin nas khyod kyis 'di'i steng du 'dug du chug shig/ ngos de 'dug tu
251b8('dul ba): bcug pa'i zan/ 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas bsams pa phyogs che be mo zhig na'o snyamo// de nas smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btang ste/ smin par shes nas zan gyi nang du
252a1('dul ba): bcags pa sbas te/ ma mal bsgo ba/ khyod kyis de 'di la jug tu chug la btsun mo 'dug nas slar srong shig/ des de bzhin byas pa las bcags dus
252a2('dul ba): reg ma thag tu pol mig rdol par gyur to// de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dang sres pa bska ba'i chus bkrus te 'tsho ba 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams btab pas sos par gyur to// 
252a3('dul ba): 'jo byed rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed khyed kyis ma yar mo'i dpyang byas sam/ lho bgyiso// khyod kyis sgren por phyung ste ma bltas drang / lha ma bltas/ 
252a4('dul ba): ji ltar byas/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas des blon po rnams la smras pa/ 'tsho byed la lan gnyis su sman pa'i rgyal por dab
252a5('dul ba): bskur cig/ mi skad can la 'tsho byed kyis sman rnyed par dka/ 'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa des smras pa/ lha ci sras la sdug pas sam/ 'on te spar mkhas pas dbang
252a6('dul ba): bskur bar mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sman mkhas paso// gal te de lta lags na/ 'dis bdag ni sos par ma bgyis// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rjengs khyod la dpang nim
252a7('dul ba): byas kyis 'on kyang ngas khyod kyi sman ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smraso// des smras pa/ bdag gi sman ji lta bu dag cig yin/ 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ gal te zla ba mar gyi nga'i chos
252a8('dul ba): bzhi la mi ser skya cig shi nas de dur khrod du sreg pa na ne'u le gdug pa dang / srog chags ge d+ha tsan 'thabs nas mer ltung ba dang de gnyis khyod kyis zos la/ dbang phyug
252b1('dul ba): po'i lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de 'thungs la/ ko dra'i chan zos shing mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs na/ de lta na khyod mod la sos par 'gyur te/ bdag gis de las bas
252b2('dul ba): nas/ sman rnyed par dka'o zhes smras pa yino// des smras pa shin tu legs par shes te/ de bzhin du bdag gis zos// de nas dga' bar 'gyur nas smras pa/ lha 'dis sman pa'i
252b3('dul ba): rgyal po rje thog gis dbang bskur bas/ dbang bskur du gsol/ lan gnyis yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur to gang gi tshe mi dge ba'i grogs pa lhas byin gyis ma skyes dgra
252b4('dul ba): bcas nas/ pa chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa sreg dang bral ba de'i tshe/ de la skran gyi nad kyis thebs par gyur to// des ldan pa rnams la smras pa/ nga la dpyad gyis shig/ de
252b5('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ lha lha'i gcan po bla na med pa'i 'tsho byed 'di na mchis bzhin du/ bdag cag gis dpyad pa byang rdog la thogs/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ 
252b6('dul ba): ldan dag 'tsho byed khug shig/ de rnams kyis bkug pa dang / 'tsho byed nga la skran gyi nang byung gis dpyad byos shig/ lha bgyi'o// des bsams pa/ rgyu gnyis kyis skran rdol bar 'a
252b7('dul ba): tilhag par dga' ba 'am/ lhag par khros pas yin na/ sems can sdig pa byed pa 'di lhag par dga' bar ga la 'gyur gyis rnam pa thams cing du khros par bya'i snyam du bas
252b8('dul ba): nas/  smras pa/ lha dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhonu 'char byed bzang po'i sha gsol nga ltar na dpyad bgyi'o// rgyal pos thos nas khros te smras pa/ leg songs ni pha srog dang
253a1('dul ba): phral khyod kyis kyang 'char byed bzang po srog dang bral/ da yang rang nyid nad kyis shi nas/ khyod ni rgyal por 'gyur mong / des smras pa/ lha dpyang ni 'di lags te/ 
253a2('dul ba): gzhan gyis sos par rngo ma thog go// bdag dang 'dra ba'i phangs pa med pas des khas blangs// des nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas
253a3('dul ba): rgyal po la phul te/ lha gzhonu 'char byed bzang po la legs par gzigs pa de ltar mdzadadu gsol/ phyis gzigs par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bstan nas/ khyim du khrid nas ba'ag
253a4('dul ba): de nas 'tsho byed sha'i don du bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song pa las/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod ni sha ba'i ros stong pa ma yin pas/ de nas des ro'i sha blangs te yo byad
253a5('dul ba): kr-i khrud par dag dang g.yos byas nas/ rgyal po dril bab pa'i dus su bstab so// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ khu'i bor pa blangs nas za bar gnas pa dang / 'tsho byed
253a6('dul ba): phrogs nas klad du bsnun te/ sdig pa byed pa khyod kyis pa chos kyi rgyal po srog dang phral ba/ dbu'i sha yang za bar byed dam/ de rngams nas smras pa/ gal te de lta na ci'i phyir bas
253a7('dul ba): ces mi bzod pa skyes pas de'i sprin rdol nas yar sgron mar 'khrus te/ kha nas khrag dang bcas par byung ba de mthong nas brgyal te/ sa la 'gyel to// de nas chus tor nas dbugs
253a8('dul ba): slar byung ba dang / khrus byas te/ 'phrod pa'i zas byin pas/ sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan te khrid tu
253b1('dul ba): rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po 'di legs te/ bdag srog chags grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral bar bgyid mi phod na
253b2('dul ba): gzhonu lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'on kyang thabs 'dis lha 'tsho bar 'gyur bas/ bdag gis thabs bshams par bgyis bar bso// rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ des
253b3('dul ba): blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur cig/ blon po rnams kyis glang po che la bskyon nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos lan gsum du yang sman pa'i rgyal
253b4('dul ba): bor dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to// des 'tsho byed dreg/ sa pa skyes te/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i sman pa ni 'jig rten na 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni lus kyi dpyang byed
253b5('dul ba): pa rnams kyis mchog yin la/ bcom ldan 'das ni sems kyi dpyad mdzad pa rnams kyi mchog yin snyam// des dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
253b6('dul ba): song ba las/ de grags pa'i snyoms pas bden pa rnams ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed na ci'i phyir bden pa
253b7('dul ba): rnams ma mthong bar gyur snyam na/ grags pa'i bsnyems pa las gyur par gzigs nas/ de'i dregs pa spang bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal
253b8('dul ba): bo 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po gangs can mthong ngam/ btsun pa ma mthong lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zung
254a1('dul ba): shig/ des bzung ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed khrid nas/ ri'i rgyal po gangs can ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / der sman
254a2('dul ba): rnam pa sna tshogs sbron pa bzhin 'ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po'i cho byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'tsho byad sman ji tsam 'dod pa long shig// bcom ldan 'das
254a3('dul ba): 'jigs lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje song la 'tsho byed la bsrung ba byos shig/ de dang song nas 'tsho byed la sman rnamapa
254a4('dul ba): sna tshogs dag blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 'a stsal pa/ 'tsho byed sman 'di ming ci yin/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das che ge mo lags te/ cho ga 'dis nang che
254a5('dul ba): ge mo zhig zhi bar 'gyuraro// 'di ni che ge mo zhig lags te/ nad chege mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// gzhan rnam sa kyi ni ming yang mi sheso// ma shes pa gang dag yin pa
254a6('dul ba): dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsha byed 'di ni che ge mo ste/ cho ga chen blan rkyen mo zhigag tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// 'di yang che ge mo zhig zhes bya'o// 'tsho byad kyis gsol pa/ 
254a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis sman dpyad kyang mkhyen pa lha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa
254a8('dul ba): ni rgyal po la 'os pa/ rgyal po la mkho ba/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangasu 'gro'o// / 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu gnyis pa/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la sman pa
254b1('dul ba): zug rngu 'byin pa nad la mkhas pa yin/ nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin/ nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa yin/ spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te nad la mkhas pa ji lta
254b2('dul ba): bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing / nad 'di ni 'di lta bu dang / 'di lta bu yin no zhes de ltar nad la mkhas pa yino// nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhen
254b3('dul ba): 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nang shes shing / nad 'di ni rlung gis kun nas bslang ba 'am/ 'khris pa kun nas bslang ba 'am/ bad kan gyis kun nas bslang ba 'am/ bdag las
254b4('dul ba): gyur pa 'am/ gzhan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'o zhes de ltar nad kun nas klong pa la mkhas pa yi no// nang byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la
254b5('dul ba): sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad 'di ni mig sman nam sku mnye 'am/ skyugs sman nam/ bkru sman nam/ snar glu gas pa 'am/ du bas bdug pa 'am/ nan rtsi'i las
254b6('dul ba): spong bar 'gyuraro zhes de ltar nad byung ba spong ba mkhas pa yino// nad spangs phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nang shes shing nang 'di ni 'phra
254b7('dul ba): pa'i cho ga 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu dag byas te/ spangs na phyis mi 'byung zhes de ltar nad spangs phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de ltar sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa yan lag pa'i nga
254b8('dul ba): ldan pa/ rgyal po la 'os pa yin rgyal po la mkho ba yin rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangasu 'gro ba yi no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
255a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa yang sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa blan med pa zhes bya'o// 'tsho byang bzhi gang dag zhen/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
255a2('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di na
255a3('dul ba): sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'tsho byed smad pa zug rngu 'byin pas
255a4('dul ba): ni skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mi she so// rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs
255a5('dul ba): pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mi gso // 'tsho byed de bzhin gshegs pas ni skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i smad mkhyen to// 
255a6('dul ba): rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mkhyen to// de ltar
255a7('dul ba): nang bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 'tsho byed gzhan nu
255a8('dul ba): bskyed/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyeso// de nas 'tsho byad gzhon nus bskyed kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gci
255b1('dul ba): slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa tho
255b2('dul ba): nas/ stan la langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btudade/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
255b3('dul ba): bdag na 'phag so// mngon par 'phag so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi na/ dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ deng slan chad dza srang 'tsho'i ba
255b4('dul ba): du srog dang sngos te skyabasu mchi bar mngon par dad lag so// de nas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan
255b5('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan snga nas song // ri'i rgyal po gangs can khabs log ste rtag tu lhags pa che bas bcom ldan 'das grang nad kyi snyun gyis thebs pa dang / sman pa'i rgyal
255b6('dul ba): 'tsho byad kyis bsams pa/ dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba bzhin bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das la rim tshwa rkye ste/ nas 'tsho byed kyis me tog ud pa la sum ts+tsha
255b7('dul ba): gnyis pa dang / bkru sman gyi rdzas dag sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams shangs kyis bsnam du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdams pa lnga
255b8('dul ba): thang sum cu rtsa gnyis kho na 'khrus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ga la legs par 'khrus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
256a1('dul ba): stsal pa/ 'tsho byad skyon gang dag g.yos la ma 'khrus pa de dag kyang yod// 'khrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod// ma 'khrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod// 'tsho byed kyis
256a2('dul ba): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na bu ram dang / a ru ra gsol la khu ba'i rim pa yang mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad nas snyur gdangs par gyur to// 
256a3('dul ba): byed kyi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po 'am/ blon po gang su'i dpyad byas kyang rung ste/ des de la grong ngam/ grong mchog sbyin par byed pa yin// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed kyis lus
256a4('dul ba): 'phags kyi rgyal po dpyang byas pa las ngas de la brgya stong ri ba'i gos be lungs yug po che zhig byin pa dang / des da blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dang song sa phyin pa dang / 
256a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug na sa/ 'tsho byad gzhon nus bskyed kyis bcom ldan 'du
256a6('dul ba): le 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po 'am/ blon po gang su'i dpyang bgyis kyang rung ste ngas bdag la grong ngam/ grang mchog stsol ba lags pas/ 
256a7('dul ba): bdag gis lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la dpyad bgyis pa dang / des bdag la brgya stong ri ba'i rang pa zhig sprul pa 'di bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'bul zhing mchis na bcom ldan 'ad
256a8('dul ba): kyis thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste 'di ban su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byad gzhan nus bskyed las brgya stong ri ba'irigs be'u rus yug po che bzhes// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan
256b1('dul ba): ba kun dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas logs na/ bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
256b2('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che long la nga'i tshe du gris dros shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs te/ sa phyogs gsal ba
256b3('dul ba): yangs par song nas gsal bar brtsams pa las/ chos gos mang du ldang par mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos gsum dang / bdag nyid kyi bla gos mthang
256b4('dul ba): gos dang / bcas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ral chung dpung chad gcig byas// bcom ldan 'das kyis nga byar gyi gnas der/ ras lnga brgya brnyes shing dge slong
256b5('dul ba): gi dge 'dun gyis kyang du ma zhig rnyed na/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya ma shes pa'i skabs de/ da ge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
256b6('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rje su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos gris dras te/ kha dog ngan par byas pa bcang bar bya'o// rgyal po gzugs
256b7('dul ba): can snying po'i kun tu spyod pa ni dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na/ glang po che las babs nas rkang pa la phyag byed pa yin// de dus gzhan zhig na/ glang po che la zhon nas/ bcom
256b8('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byedadu song ba las/ ji tsam na lam gyi dbus nas 'tsho ba zhig mthong nas/ de de la gus pa bskyed/ glang po che la babs nas dang pa
257a1('dul ba): gnyis la gtug so// de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis bsams pa lha ni dge slong 'ba' shig la mngon par dad pa ma yino// dad pa can gang yin pa de dag
257a2('dul ba): gis bsams pa ni gdon mi za bar lngas dge slong yin snyam ste/ de bus pas glang po che las babs nas/ rkang pa gnyis la gdug so snyam nas/ de rnams ying gnyis su gyur
257a3('dul ba): rgyal po la smras pa/ lhas su la phyag bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la'o// lha de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos pa lags te/ 'tsho ba lag so// de nas rgyal po
257a4('dul ba): gzugs can snying pos 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi don 'di kho na gsol snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dra
257a5('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu dgo/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgya la po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan
257a6('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las babs nas/ de'i rkang pa la phyag bgyid pa lags pa las
257a7('dul ba): de ring bdag gus pa skyes nas byung po tshe las babs te dge slong legs snyam nas/ 'cha ba'i rkang pa gtugs lags kyis/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar
257a8('dul ba): bzung ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyi chos gos rnams la mtshan ma cung zad cig gdab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po cang mi gsung bas gan // nga
257b1('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas snang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song // de na bac+doMs kyis dge
257b2('dul ba): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'tsho ba pa gang gis bden pa mthong ba la phyag bdag gir byas pa nyams te/ mi rung // de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das
257b3('dul ba): kyi gnam logs na bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo
257b4('dul ba): khyod kyis lus 'phags kyi ri bo mthong ngam/ btsun pa ma mthong lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos go/ sa kyi mtha' nas zung shig/ des bzung ba dang / de nas bcwa
257b5('dul ba): kyis rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar mdzad/ de nyid nas rdza 'phrul gyis steng gi na mkha' la gshegs nas lus la phags kyi ri bo la bzhug so// de'i tshe ma ga d+hi'i maM rnam
257b6('dul ba): kyi zhing mnyam shing nye 'khor mnyam pa rnang gi khyad par sna tshogs dag nang sbal gyis 'brel cing mdzes pa dag gzigs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 
257b7('dul ba): dga' bo khyod kyi zhing mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnya pi la nang gi khyad par sna tshogs dag rnang sbal gyis 'brel par mdzes pa de dag mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lagaso// kun dga' bo
257b8('dul ba): de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras te drub par bya'o// gnas brtan kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la smras pa/ khyed kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams
257b9('dul ba): chos la drub shig/ dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dras te drub par brtsams na/ rnams bu rnams kha phyogs gcig tu bstan pas mi mdzes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsam
258a1('dul ba): pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal mod kyis/ 'di kho nas rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i sa de yod snyam nas/ des snam bu rnams kha phyogs gnyis
258a2('dul ba): kar bstan nas/ 'on kyang mtha' sker med pas mdzes par ma gyur nas/ mtha' skor bso// de nas byas shing zin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la pu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
258a3('dul ba): pa kun dga' bo lagaso lag so// ngas gang phyir bka' stsal pa/ de khyad kyis shes te/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras la drub par bya'o// dge slong rna
258a4('dul ba): kyis chos gos dras shing drubs pa re re bcangs nas/ lha/ ga ma ni ma draso// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ 'brog gan su byon nas 'brog gaR+Sha
258a5('dul ba): na 'brog gnas kyi tshal na ba'ug so// 'brog gnas 'ab ba chu dang nye bas grang zhing rlung ldang bar gyur ras bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thun dang po la mthang gos gsol to//

258a7('dul ba): lag pa gnyis bkrus nas snam sbyar gyis babacom ldan 'das kyi steng du g.yogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos gsum gyis mtshan mo de 'das par mdzad// de
258a8('dul ba): nam nangs nas dgongs pa 'jig rten na shin tu bskyed pa/ bde bar 'dod pa gang yin pa su yang rung de rnams kyi mchog ning yin te/ nga yang chos gos gsum gyis 'tsho bar spyod napa
258b1('dul ba): nyan thos rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du dgod/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal na/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o// ba
258b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa/ dge slong zhig la chos gos gsum pa med nas de'i phying pa zhig rnyed nas des dra bar brtsam so// bac+doMs
258b3('dul ba): kyang phyogs der gshegs nas smras pa/ dge slong 'di ci yin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/

258b5('dul ba): klan pa'i 'os yin pas ldan thabs kyis klan nas baHnga bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas gshegs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi
258b6('dul ba): gung la bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la chos gos mang
258b7('dul ba): nas phying ba 'dra bar byed kyis dge slong dag de lta bas na mi dra ba ni lnga ste/ phying ba thams cad dang snam bu thams cad dang bai'u ras thams cad dang / seng sa thams cad dang / bla ma thang
258b8('dul ba): lhan thabs kyis klan nas bcang bar bya'o// // glang bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po'i mchog ri dgas 'dzin ces bya ba des rigs snyam
