285b4('dul ba): 'phar dang bcas pa dang / char bab pa 'am/ char 'bab tu dogos pa dang / 'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas dang / dge 'dun gyis pa
285b5('dul ba): ba byin par gyur pa'o// bar sdom gyi tshigasu bcad pa/ dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi/ 'byung ba gnyi sa bo dag dang ni// rnyeng pa chung dang 'gyod pa dang // dag 'ang
285b6('dul ba): rnyed dang de de yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na dge slong rnams kyis dgag dpe byas pa'i ma kho na la ljongs
285b7('dul ba): rgyur dang pa dang / de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i rnyed pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir/ dge slong la bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o// 
285b8('dul ba): mi bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol pa'i dge slong gis rnyed pa
286a1('dul ba): blang bar mi bya'o// blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro// bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams
286a2('dul ba): kyis thams cad mngon par bya'o// dge tshul rnams dong nas sus kyang rnyed pa ma blangs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyi mkhan po drang / slob dpon dag
286a3('dul ba): gis blang bar bya'o// dge slong dag rnyed pa chung ngu dag 'ged par byed pa na/ rnyed pa chung ngu yi no// snyam nas/ dong ba rnams kyi sa byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa
286a4('dul ba): gang la ngatsal ba rnams kyis blang bar bya'o// ga/ na dag gis ma bcol por nga bdang / de rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyong
286a5('dul ba): ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa laM pa/ blang bar bya ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// rnyed ba chung ngu gzhan dag dgor mchog nas/ bcom ldan 'das
286a6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan dag dang bsres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcol bas skud pa chung ngum blangs na
286a7('dul ba): ma sha ka lnga'i rin lan chad ni nges par bda' bar bya'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag zhig yod pa des gtsug lag zhig brtsigs nas/ de na gal te dge slong brgya gnas na/ 
286a8('dul ba): yug brgya 'bul// de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ngas yug brgya kho na 'bulo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig ni/ gtsug lag khang de ga dunan su
286b1('dul ba): gnyis shig dbyar gnas pa las khyim bdag des ras yug brgya bskur ba/ de gnyis kyis blangs nas/ phan tshun dbyar dpyad nas gcig gis smras pa/ rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun
286b2('dul ba): gyir 'gyur ro// gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag cag kho na'i 'gyuraro// gal te de lta na long shig/ des smras pa/ phan tshun rtsod par mi 'gyur grang / ji tsam na gcig gis kyang
286b3('dul ba): ma blangs/ de gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gcig gis smras pa/ dge slong rnams bos la de rnams dang lhan cig bgo'o// gcig shos kyis smras
286b4('dul ba): pa de bzhin du byas na su 'gro/ gang gzhon pa'o// gos rnams sus srung / gang gzhon paso// de ltar mi nus kyis gang gzhon pa ni 'gro'o// gang rgan pa de ni gos rnams srung
286b5('dul ba): de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon pa shes dge slong rnam sa 'bod pa'i phyir mnyan yod du song // drug sde rnam sa kyi kun du spyod pa ni drug sde rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal bye
286b6('dul ba): kyi tshal sgo ri mos ri mos kyi mi stongs par byed pa yi na bas/ nye dga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo nas 'dug pa des rgyang ring po kho na nas mgo smra ba'i me tog lhar skya ba
286b7('dul ba): smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gis de bsur 'gro'o snyam nas/ gnas brtan byon pa leg so// byon pa legaso// slob dpon
286b8('dul ba): phyag 'tsha lo// des bsams pa/ 'di ni slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes te/ 'di ni rgan zhugs zhig yin snyam du rig nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod gang nas
287a1('dul ba): 'ongs/ ri 'or che ge mo zhig naso// ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod// ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/ 'on te 'phongs pa yin/ 
287a2('dul ba): ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / khyod don cig zhig la 'ongs/ dge slong rnams dang bgo ba'i phyiraro// gal te de lta na nga kho nas khyod la snying rje ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o// slob
287a3('dul ba): dpon leg so// nye dgas bsams pa/ gal te 'di bdag gi thad nas gzhan du song na skye bo'i tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyis/ legs par bsrung bar bya'o snyam na
287a4('dul ba): des de ngal sor bcug ste/ dus ma yin pa'i btu nga bdag blung nas/ ji nas kyang bre mo gtam gyis na ma sros kyi bar du brongs nas mal bzang po bshams
287a5('dul ba): rkang pa kru ba dang / rkang pa bsku ba byin nas ji tsam gnyid log par gyur pa de snyidang bsda // de nas nye dga' gsang 'phel bar mi 'gyur grang skam pa'i 'tsher bas mtshan mo nga
287a6('dul ba): 'das par byas// de nas de nang par sngar langs te rgan zhugs khrid nas rings pa rings par song ste/ rim gyis ri 'or du phyin pa dang / de nas gtsug lag khang du gnas pa'i rgan zhugs
287a7('dul ba): gcig shes des 'ongs pa legaso zhes kun dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig smras nas/ de gnyis ngal sos pa dang / khong gsum car yang gnas gcig tu 'tshogs nas/ nye dwags
287a8('dul ba): smras pa/ rnyed pa gos shig/ gnas brtan bga'o// nye dgas rgan zhugs gcig la smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis gos shig/ gnas brtan bdag mi bgor// de ci'i phyir
287b1('dul ba): zhe na/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung // gcig shos la yang smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/ des kyang de bzhin du smras pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ khyod ni nyes pa
287b2('dul ba): byung bas 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' ni spyi'i chug su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'dod dam ci/ nye dgus bsams pa/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis sdong gis dbyen bya
287b3('dul ba): snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun tu rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po mthong nas/ gcig gis drung du song ste dris pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas
287b4('dul ba): brtan bdag gis gtsug lag khang dag tu rtag tu chag chag btab phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byaso// rgan zhugs gal te chag chag dang phyag dar byas
287b5('dul ba): pa kho nas rnyed pa thob na lta/ nye dga' gtsugs/ ga khang thams cad chag chag dang phyag dar bya'o// 'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ rgan
287b6('dul ba): zhugs gcig shos de'i mthu yin te/ de gtsug lag khang du dus dus chos 'don pa'i sbyin pa byed pas chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par gyur te/ 
287b7('dul ba): des na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyis 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// des de gnad la phab pas skyed nu cang mi smra bar 'dug/ de nas gcig shes kyi dru
287b8('dul ba): du song nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis 'di ru dus dus su chos bsgrags pa'i sbyin pa byas// rgan zhugs gal
288a1('dul ba): te chos bsgrags pas rnyed pa thob na lta/ nye dgas 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dus thams cad du chos bsha // rnyeng pa gang cu
288a2('dul ba): zang brang de thams cad ri rgar zhugs gcig shos de'i mthus yin te/ des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang phyag dar dang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byaso// bcom
288a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis phyag dar byed de la yon ta lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid
288a4('dul ba): dge' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhi gnas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams
288a5('dul ba): su skye bar 'gyu ro zhes bka' stsal to// de lta bas na gtsug lag khang phyag dar byas pas yon pad ga mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga' bar
288a6('dul ba): gyur te/ des na de nad pa 'byung bar gyur to// de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas ngas ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// de yang gnang la phab pas
288a7('dul ba): sgyings nas cang mi smra bar 'dug// de gnyis spobs pa med par byas nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsungs
288a8('dul ba): thangs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la bgo'o// de gnyis kyis sngar smrabab pas smras pa/ gnas brtan ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas nye dgas chags
288b1('dul ba): du byas te/ cha gnyis kyi bar du ni rang nyid 'dug/ de gnyis kyi bar du ni cha cig bzhag nas gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa/ rgan zhugs khyed gnyis dang 'di gcig/ 'di
288b2('dul ba): gnyis dang kho bo cig ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum// gnyis rtsod par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgos shig/ des dgo bar brtsams pa/ de nas ras
288b3('dul ba): yug gcig kha 'khyer du 'dug pa de yang blangs nas ras rnams bam po bcings te song // de nas rim gyis mnyan yo du phyin pa dang / de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas
288b4('dul ba): smras pa/ btsun pa 'i dgar khyod kyis su zhig shi ba mthong / des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smos pa/ khyed de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam
288b5('dul ba): mi mdza' ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan naso// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyes
288b6('dul ba): dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thong rgyal mi bya'o// thob
288b7('dul ba): rgyal byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcor ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang
288b8('dul ba): ldan pa nye dgas rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad/ 'das
289a1('dul ba): pa'i ngas na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba'ang ba chu'i ngogs shig na/ sra gnyis shig gnas
289a2('dul ba): pa las de gnyis gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya skam la thon par 'gyur zhing gang gi tshe skam la dang ba de'i tshe chu'i nang du dong nas chu zad kyang mi rnyed // de nas nga gnyis
289a3('dul ba): kyis gros byas pa/ dadag cag las gcig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o// gcig shos kyis ni skam la ste/ rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni spyir bya'o// de ni cig ni chur song ngo // gcig
289a4('dul ba): shos ni skam la ste/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yi nabs nya rnams bsgrogs te skam la gton nas// de rnams skam la gnas pas pas de// chu la gnas
289a5('dul ba): pa ni chu la gnas pa nyid kyiso// ji tsam na nya'i phu ngo bo chen por gyur pa dang / gcig gis smras pa khyod kyis bgos shig gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bang
289a6('dul ba): mi bzod ci'i phyir/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung // des kyang smras pa/ gal te de lta nang dag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yino// de gnyis sems khongasu chud cing 'dub
289a7('dul ba): pa las/ ji tsam na wa bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba/ de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas des smras pa/ tsha bo dag ci ste khongasu chud cing 'dug/ zhang po dag bdag cig ni nya rnyed pas/ 
289a8('dul ba): ci ste mi bgod/ gang po nyes pas 'jig so// khyed ni nyes pas 'jigs la/ bzhin rgyas ni rkang pa'i spyi'u chugasu sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar
289b1('dul ba): 'dod dam ci / bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis gdong gis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa ru sbal zhig mthong nas/ gcig
289b2('dul ba): gi drung du song ste dris pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag chur zhugs te bdag chur zhugs nas nya rnams bsgrogs te/ skams la thon pa dang // 'dis
289b3('dul ba): bsang // tsha bo gal te chur zhugs pas cung zad thob na lta/ bzhi rgyas rtag tu chu nang du 'gro'o// skam la 'gro nga ni sdong dum gyi 'jigs pa dang / tsher ma'i 'jigs
289b4('dul ba): ba dang / gcan zan gyi 'dzegs pa dang / mi'i 'ji/ sa pa dang / ngam grog 'jigs pa yod// gzhan yang gal te des me sang na/ khyod kyis bsgrogs kyang ci phan/ 
289b5('dul ba): mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya/ ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// des de ga nad pa le phab pas
289b6('dul ba): skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/ de nas gcig shos drung du song nas smras pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag bya// zhang po bdag gis skam la song ste/ bdag gis skam
289b7('dul ba): la thon pa'i nya rnams pas do// tsha bo gal te skam la song nas chung zad thab na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o// chur 'gro ba'i de dpa' grong gis 'jigs pa dang / 
289b8('dul ba): ru sbal gyis 'jigs pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kyi 'jigs pa dang / chu srin ku me bi ra'i 'jigs pa dang / tshu'i 'jigs pa yong // gzhar yang gal te ngas
290a1('dul ba): ma bsgrogs na khyad kyis ji ltar bsad/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas de ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 
290a2('dul ba): 'khang par mi bya'o// des de gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/ bzhin rgyas kyis smras pa/ tsha bo dag 'di la tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ mi g.yo
290a3('dul ba): bar bgo ba'i thabs yod// de sngar smra phab pas smras pa/ zhang po ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ bzhin rgyas kyi cha gsum pa bgos te/ nya'i 'jug ma rnams
290a4('dul ba): gcig tu byas/ mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/ bar gyi cha rnams gcig tu byas nas/ tshig su bcad smras pa/ thang la rgyu bas mjug ma ste/ ga ting du rgyu tha
290a5('dul ba): mgo bo'o// bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa/ de ni tshe sa la gnas pas bkur// bzhin rgyas kyis ba sems pa/ 'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang
290a6('dul ba): ldan snyam nas des nya chen pa zhig gi rkang pa khyer te/ ma'i drung du song ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyi dris pa/ bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang
290a7('dul ba): nas 'ongs// mgo yang med cing mjug mang po'o// nya bo che zhig thogs nas ni// shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs// des smras pa/ gang phyir blun po rtsod gyur cing / tshwa
290a8('dul ba): dang chos min mi shes pas// rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar// des ni chog shes 'tshe bar 'gyur// des kyang tshigasu bcad pa smras pa/ rgyas pas blta na sdug pa
290b1('dul ba): khyod pha rol mnan pa shin tu legs// de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la// khyed kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa
290b2('dul ba): bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yino// sram gnyis po gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang de gnyis 'dris bslus la/ da ltar yang
290b3('dul ba): de gnyis bsdus/ gleng gzhi ni gnyen yang na'o// ri'or zhig na khyim bdag zhig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhag brtsigs nis/ dar dag
290b4('dul ba): brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcaso// khyim dadag/ de'i blo skyes paras yug brgya bsgrubs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshong gsol nas/ dge slong re la
290b5('dul ba): yang ras yug ra re bskon no snyam// ji tsam na nyed gas khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis dge slong gi nga ge 'dun gdugs tshong gsol te/ re re la yang ras
290b6('dul ba): yug rari re bskono zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ gal te de las ras lug gcig ma grub na/ bdag nye dga' ma yin snyam nas dmagron du ma pos bzhin du
290b7('dul ba): song ngo // khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ ras rnams 'grim pa dang / nye dgas ras gcig blangs nas myur myur bor song // ji tsam
290b8('dul ba): na dge slong gcig gis ras chad// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te 'tshal mchis na 'phags pa 'ga' zhig
291a1('dul ba): gis ras yug gnyis bsnams par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de ltar su zhig byed 'od kyang btsun pa 'i dpa' 'ang
291a2('dul ba): kyis spyan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis spyan ma drangs// des ras de khyer nas song ngo // de nis khyim bdag de spod par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
291a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsor pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong dag mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa
291a4('dul ba): las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis mgron dum bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// / thab rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro// dag
291a5('dul ba): spang rnams the tsam skyes nas/ the tsam thams cad gcod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa tsho dang ldan pa nye dga' gal ma drangs pa
291a6('dul ba): gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyid pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da lta 'ba' zhig tu ma zad te/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang
291a7('dul ba): dgas mgron dum bos pas gzhan gyi rnyeng pa la thab rgyal byas pa de nyin cig/ dge slong dag slong byung ba ri bor nag na bram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod/ 
291a8('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u brgya/ zla ba gsum du mgron du bos te zan byin nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang ras lug re re bskon snyam// da ding ha cang yang mi ring ba
291b1('dul ba): zhig na/ bram ze rgan po zhig gnas pa des thos nas/ de rgan po'i mthar 'dug ste/ thog mar zos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song // bram zes ras rnams 'drim par
291b2('dul ba): byed pa na/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gcig gis ras chad nas des dris pa shes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na bram ze'i khye'u 'ga'
291b3('dul ba): zhig gis ras yug gnyis blangs par ma gyur grang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ de ltar su zhig bgyid/ 'on kyang khyod kyis bram ze rgan po mgron du bos sam/ bdag gis
291b4('dul ba): mgron du byoso// des ras yug de thog mar blangs nas song ngo // bram ze des smad par brtsam so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze rgan po gang yin
291b5('dul ba): pa de ni/ nyedaga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang de mgro na du ma bos so// da lta na yang ngo // gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag
291b6('dul ba): cig yod pa des/ gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas der dge slong gcig dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa la sa/ de ldang ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ des nyi ma
291b7('dul ba): re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag dar byed// gtsug lag khang da ni sa phyogs dpan zhing bzang ba'i phyogasu brtsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa dang pa
291b8('dul ba): dang khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne co dang / ri skags dang / khu byug rnams skad 'byin pa me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi mdzes par byas pa yi no// ji tsam na dedang dben 'byor pa
292a1('dul ba): rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang der dgongs btab pa las/ des gtsug lag khang de mdzes pa dang / nye ba'i tshal mdzes pa dag mthong nas
292a2('dul ba): mngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i tshe du rnyed pa phal mo che zhig bskur nas/ de nang par sngar langs te song ngo // dge slong de 'dzem bag can zhig
292a3('dul ba): pas rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no zhes 'gyed pa las ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'a
292a4('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gis pa'i lci ba'i khang pa ra dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang der gal
292a5('dul ba): ta bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi che du rnyed pa nyung ngu'am/ phal mo cher phul na de na gnas pa gcig gam gnyis sam rab tu mang po
292a6('dul ba): gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sdom la bye ba rnams la skal ba ni// sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las// dge 'dun dang ni chos gos kyi// rnyed pa brgyad bya
292a7('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dbyar gyi nang log su dge 'dun bye bar gyur na rnyed bskye
292a8('dul ba): bar bgyi 'am mi stsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin kha cig la ni mi sbyin// gang la stsal bar bgyi chos dang 'bru
292b1('dul ba): pa'i phyogs la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang log su dge slong gis bslab pa phul te nyams par gyur na rnyed pa stsal par bgyi 'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la
292b2('dul ba): ni sbyin// kha cig la ni mi sbyin// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gum par gyur na// rnyed pa stsal bar
292b3('dul ba): bgyi 'am/ rnyed pa stsal bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin// kha cig la ni mi sbyin// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// ri 'or zhing zhig
292b4('dul ba): na khyim bdag cig yod pa des yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las gtsug lag khang pa
292b5('dul ba): phyin pa dang / khyim bdag des zas byin nas/ ras su ge lnga brgya byin pa dang / des ras yug lnga brgya po de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo // 
292b6('dul ba): ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa dra srong len pa dang / drang srong byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las re 'or de nyi du phyin nas/ khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin nas
292b7('dul ba): ras yug lnga rgya byin no// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi mkhan pos khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na
292b8('dul ba): dgos kyis de rang gi rnyed pa 'di rnams bdag kha nas thob par 'gyur// nga gnyis kyis smras pa/ mkhan po ni bsod nams che ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/ ngas pa
293a1('dul ba): 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad// de rnams kyis slar lan klan par brtsams pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang
293a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rnyed pa brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / 
293a3('dul ba): rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / dge 'dun gyir btags pa dang / dge slong gir btags pa dang / dbyar gyi dang / mngon sum dang / so sor brtan pa'o// mtshams kyis thong
293a4('dul ba): pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gnas nyid la/ gso spyong gcig la ste/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis kyi rna dang gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i
293a5('dul ba): gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin// de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rgyal gso sbyong tha dad par dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/ 
293a6('dul ba): de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin te/ gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di
293a7('dul ba): ni mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// khrims kyis rnyed pa gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrimasu bca' ba khyed kyi ni khyim che ge ma
293a8('dul ba): zhig go// kho bo cag gi ni khyim che ge mo zhig/ lam po che dang tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mngo ni spyi'i yi no zhes bya ba nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las
293b1('dul ba): gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams kyi gan su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed
293b2('dul ba): 'phul la/ dmam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas dam bcas pa dang / dmam
293b3('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul na// rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na dam bcas pa kho
293b4('dul ba): na'o// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po re lnga pa/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ da
293b5('dul ba): bcas pa rnams la rnyeng pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe/ na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnam
293b6('dul ba): kyi gnas dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chungangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyu
293b7('dul ba): zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed
293b8('dul ba): pa phul la rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan gyi
294a1('dul ba): dmam bcas pa rnams rnyed pa phul la dam ma bcas pa rnams la chungs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam
294a2('dul ba): pa rnams kyi gnasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang
294a3('dul ba): bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnam
294a4('dul ba): la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/  da pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa na mas kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gan su dam bcwa
294a5('dul ba): pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// 
294a6('dul ba): ltar dam bcas pa rnams kyis gnasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas shes bya ba rnam grangs dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa
294a7('dul ba): rnams kyi gnasu dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o// gal te bram ze dang / khyim bdag de rnams kyis lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / 
294a8('dul ba): bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnamasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams khon
294b1('dul ba): la chu dras na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dag
294b2('dul ba): slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che
294b3('dul ba): dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnamasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul
294b4('dul ba): la dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na// rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnamasu dam bcas pa
294b5('dul ba): dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas// dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar
294b6('dul ba): 'gyur zhe na// gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams dam bcas pa dang // dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ rgan
294b7('dul ba): pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mngon
294b8('dul ba): su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma btsam pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu dras na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur
295a1('dul ba): zhan gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnamasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan
295a2('dul ba): byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar logs rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams mchu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / 
295a3('dul ba): bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnamasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa
295a4('dul ba): gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams dam bcas pa dang / dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan
295a5('dul ba): pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mtha' nyid chu dras na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa dgu yin pa
295a6('dul ba): de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod pa ra bya ste/ 'di ni khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya 'o// rten gyis rnyed pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skyes pa 'am/ 
295a7('dul ba): medang ngam/ ma ning gang la brtan te/ dbyar gnas par dam bcas padas myed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni/ de kha na'i yin te/ 'ad ni rten gyis thob pa'i nang pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun
295a8('dul ba): gyir btags pa'i rnyeng pa gang zhan/ rnyeng pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun gyir btags pa'i rnyeng pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge slong gir btags pa
295b1('dul ba): rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye nas gnas khang pa'i'o// yang thog pa'i 'o// khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'o zhes brta/ yo// de na dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa de
295b2('dul ba): na'i ste/ 'di ni dge slong gir btags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis ba
295b3('dul ba): bste/ 'di ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// mngon sum gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig ma nges la dmigs kyis ma phye ba'i ste/ 'di ni mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// so sor
295b4('dul ba): bstan pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig bsta ma pa dang / byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la phul ba ste/ gal
295b5('dul ba): mchod rten chen po bzhir khyer mi nus na/ mchod rten cig kho na la dbul gyi gzhan la ni ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// sdom la
295b6('dul ba): gnas nas phyung dang shi ba dang / bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang / gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang / dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas pacom
295b7('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di ltar gnas cig na/ gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la
295b8('dul ba): de rnams las gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams// btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni gan
296a1('dul ba): mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu mang po lags na/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum/ de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa
296a2('dul ba): rnams kho na'o// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni nyung ba las gnas nas phyung ba zhig bum lags ni rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lag/ 
296a3('dul ba): rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na/ gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang ba dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la de rnams las
296a4('dul ba): rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gu ma lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnam so// gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas
296a5('dul ba): pa gnyis mchis pa las/ rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum pa lags na/ gum pa de'i yo byad gang dang nga bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig shes// 
296a6('dul ba): gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang la/ rang bzhin du ga nas pa ni gcig mchis pa la gun rnyed pa gang dbang ba ra 'gyur lags/ gnas nas byung ba rnams las thog mar
296a7('dul ba): sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnam
296a8('dul ba): le khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'god par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin/ 
296b1('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa 'ged par byed na/ gsol pa legs pa bgos pa yi no// bsres nas bgod par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi
296b2('dul ba): dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par sngos pa yinano// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drung du
296b3('dul ba): gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma byung bar shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i chos gos dang ltung
296b4('dul ba): bzed long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes bar bgos pa yin// dam ma bcas pa rnams la 'geng pa
296b5('dul ba): byed na/ bgos pa legs par dgos pa yi no// bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed
296b6('dul ba): na lags par bsngos pa yino// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la
296b7('dul ba): khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed chos gos long shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams 'god par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes
296b8('dul ba): par bgos pa yin// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin// bsres te 'ged par byed nam bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yino// 
297a1('dul ba): phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs na
297a2('dul ba): skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba nyid shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi
297a3('dul ba): tshangs pa mtshungs par spyang pa she yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces po sa btang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams 'ged par byed nam bgos panye bar bags
297a4('dul ba): yino dam ma bcas pa rnams 'god par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin// bsres nas 'geng par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin// 
297a5('dul ba): phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yi no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas
297a6('dul ba): na dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams
297a7('dul ba): 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin// bsres te 'ged par byed na/ ma badz+ra
297a8('dul ba): panyes par bgos pa yi no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na// legs par bsngos pa yin// dmam bcas pa rnams kyis gnas su dam bcas pa'i
297b1('dul ba): dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma phyung bar shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam
297b2('dul ba): bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nye bar
297b3('dul ba): bgos pa yino// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin// bsres te 'gad par byed na/ ma bgos pa nye bar bgos pa yino// phyogs ba
297b4('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas dam pa cas pa'i dge slong 'ongs te shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams
297b5('dul ba): kyis dam bcas po rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa ma tshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcwa
297b6('dul ba): pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yino// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yi no// bsres te 'bed
297b7('dul ba): par byed nam bgos pa nyes pa bgos pa yin// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yi no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas
297b8('dul ba): dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o// zhes smras pa las de yang ma byung ba shi na/ dam ma
298a1('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kyi dam bcas la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces po nyadadang bar bya'o// da
298a2('dul ba): ma bcas pa rnams 'bed par byedan/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yino// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ dgos pa legs par bgos yi no// bsres te 'ged par
298a3('dul ba): byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yino// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yino// sdom ni nye dga' dang ni byin gyis
298a4('dul ba): brlabs/ bar ma sbyin dang brlab bya dang / bdag gi sbyin pa med pa dang // spang ba dang ni mi ga su mo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan lo nga na'o// nye dga'i spyi bor po la migacig byung nas das
298a5('dul ba): pa'i gan du song nas bzhin bzangs kho bo la ston cig/ des smras pa 'phags pa mar khu gsol cig dang sos par 'gyu ro// nye dgas bsams pa/ gal teng ring
298a6('dul ba): kho na 'thungs nas/ de ring nyi du sos par gyur na/ sang mar dang gos bslang ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/ re shig bslangs la phyi nas brdung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du shes
298a7('dul ba): nas bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa des lhan cig gnas pa rnams kun tu mngags pa dang / de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang / rma g.yog pa'i gos pal mo che drang so// 
298a8('dul ba): de nyin par sman pas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod snyan gdangs sam khyod kyis mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thung so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyis deng
298b1('dul ba): nyis 'gyur du gsol cig/ des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa/ sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/ mkhan po thos pa lag so// kho bo'i nang 'di ni cher skyes
298b2('dul ba): par 'gyur te/ mar dang rma g.yog pa'i gos mang du gos kyis spongs shig/ de rnams kyis mar dang gos pal mo che bslang so// de sang gi thabs la chags par gyur pas/ 
298b3('dul ba): nyi ma de la yang ma 'thungs pas/ de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to// ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa mar gsol ta ma/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungaso// 
298b4('dul ba): 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyi so// des smras pa bzhi na bzangs de ring ni sum gyur du btu // sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te mar gyi sgrom gyi nang du nub
298b5('dul ba): par zhugs kyang da ni khyod la srog ma mchis so// des smras pa gshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi mgu la pa rdzogs pas mnan la mar 'thungs dang sos par
298b6('dul ba): 'gyu ro// sman pa des mjal to zhes byas nas khros te song ngo // de nas nye dgas mar khus lhung bzed bkang ste 'thungs pa las ma zhu nas shi'o// de la gser mang du yod de/ 
298b7('dul ba): cha gcig ni chos gos laso// cha gnyis pa ni nad kyi rkyen sman las// cha gsum pa ni rdungasu byas pa dang / ma byas pa lngas te/ gAser srang sum khri byung zhes blon po rnam
298b8('dul ba): kyis thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha 'phags pa nye dga' 'gum pa las/ de lags ri mang du byung ste/ gsor sum khri mchis kyis de la bka' stsal pa'i rig so// rgyal
299a1('dul ba): pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na deng la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob shig/ dge slong rnams de khyer te sreg tu song // de rnams kyang lhags nas/ gnas khang rgyu
299a2('dul ba): btab po dge slong rnams kyis dang dur khrod bsregs nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na/ gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
299a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la nga'i tshig gis rgyal po gsal rgyal
299a4('dul ba): la nang med par gyur cig ces byas la/ 'di skad ces rgya la po chen po gang gi tshe khyod rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis dge slong ce dga' la bsdus
299a5('dul ba): sam/ 'on te gang gi tshe khyod bag ma gtong ba 'am/ bag ma len pa de'i tshe nye dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyi sa ji srid 'tsho ba'i chos gos dang / bsod nams dang
299a6('dul ba): gnas mal dang na ba'i rkyen rtsi dang yo byad rnams kyis bsdams sam/ 'on te na ba na rim gro byas sa ma zhes gyis shig/ gal te ma bgyi so zhes smra na/ de la rgyal po
299a7('dul ba): chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chung ngus gnas par gyis shig/ rnyed pa 'di ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod
299a8('dul ba): pa rnams dbang par 'gyur bas gtogs 'dod thang shig ces spros shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das
299b1('dul ba): ltar mnyan nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga na ba der song ste phyin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo// 
299b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa bzhin du bgyis te/ bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po'i lan bcom ldan 'das la
299b3('dul ba): gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyod kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad bgos shig/ dge slong rnams kyi
299b4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi dbus phyung ste/ bsgyur nas bgoso// gan sa bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye dga' shi na sa/ de la gsor mang du byung ste/ gser srang sumakhri
299b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis dgoso// zhes thos nas de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun po nye dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs pa
299b6('dul ba): spyod pa yin pas bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyu ro// dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag dang lhan cig yang bgo so// yangs pa can dang / wa ra na se ba dang / 
299b7('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/ de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus// dge
299b8('dul ba): slong rnams sdud cing 'ged pa na/ lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang 'don pa dang / yid la byed pa bor ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / 
300a1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa go ba'i rgyu ni lnga ste lnga gang zhe na/ gaN+DI dang / rgyud chags gsum dang / mchod rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni gsol pa
300a2('dul ba): shi ba'i gaN+DI de rdung ba na 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/ rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'grim pa dang / gsol ba bye
300a3('dul ba): pan yang de bzhi no// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol ba byas te/ dgos na mi 'khrugs par 'gyuraro// 'di ltar yang byas te/ gnas mal pa
300a4('dul ba): la zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'bru na par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhi no// shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/ dge
300a5('dul ba): slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la gsol ba bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol ga nas 'dir dge slong nya dga' gum pa de'i yo byad gang
300a6('dul ba): ba dang / mi gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis
300a7('dul ba): dge slong nye dag 'gum pa'i yo byad rdzas gda' ba dang / mi ganga' ba la gum pa'i yo byang du byin gyis brlab pa'o// 'di na gsol ba'o// dge slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i mi byung
300a8('dul ba): pags zin pa ste/ 'di lta ste gsol pa'o// gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa mi sbyin// tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bac+doMs
300b1('dul ba): la zhus pa/ btsun pa gang na dge 'dun mi mthun pas gsol bar bgyid pa ma mchis pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi 'am/ bgo bar mi bgyid lags/ nye bar 'khor
300b2('dul ba): thog ma dang tha mar byas nas bgo bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yo byad cig sbyar te de las cung zhig
300b3('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis rgan pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhon pa la byin nas ci dga' bar 'gro bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gsol pa 'am thog ma dang tha ma mi byas pa'i yo byad kyi
300b4('dul ba): rnyed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar 'gyur// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas// the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lus pa/ 
300b5('dul ba): btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ma 'ongs pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'a ngas kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba'
300b6('dul ba): zhig du ma zad/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'ongs par chags pas shi ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba rngon pa zhig gis mnga' dug can gyis glang po che'i gan du
300b7('dul ba): bsnun pa dang / de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda' phyi rjes bzhin du song nas/ rngon pa de srog dang bral// ji tsam na ma stes te/ chem rkun pa lnga pargyu ri 'or zhig
300b8('dul ba): bcom nas phyogs der phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong // mu gding bcas pa'i dus byung bas nga rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dog sha 'di nid kyis nyes
301a1('dul ba): brgya lnga bcus ni glang po che'i sha bcad la bco'o// nyis brgya lnga bcus ni chu glang // de na glang po che'i sha bcad cing 'tsheng ba gang yin pa de rnams 'di
301a2('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas/ rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyis de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin/ sha las ci yog pa zos la/ lhag
301a3('dul ba): ma dug gis gang po// de dag gis sha dug can zos dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyu ro// zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos nas/ lhag ma dug gis btab// 
301a4('dul ba): gang dag tshul dang ba de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du byang nas chu ci log pa 'thungs nas/ lhag mdug blugs te 'ongs nas/ gang dag gis ni shi zas pa rnams
301a5('dul ba): kyis kyang chu 'thungs/ gang dag gis chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar gyur to// ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings
301a6('dul ba): nas/ phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des ro de dag thams cad mthong // de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa/ bdag la rnyed pa phal mo che yod kyis rim pa
301a7('dul ba): bzhin du bya'o snyam nas des gzhu mchog kha ra bcug ste/ gzhu rgyud kyi rtod pa rgyus pa bca bar brtsams te/ de nas rgyas pa chod dang mchog mase dkan la zug na
301a8('dul ba): shi bar gyur to// lhas tshig su bcad pas smras pa/ bsags pa ri yang ni bya ba ste/ lhag par bsags par mi bya'o// sogs la chags pa'i wa long ba/ ga'u yis pa
301b1('dul ba): par gyur la ltos// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang lhag par chags pas shi'o// da ltar yang
301b2('dul ba): lhag par chags pas shi bar gyur to// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nang tshabs tsha ba zhig yong pa de/ dge slong gis rim
301b3('dul ba): gro byas na 'on kyang shi bar gyur nas nga'i lhung bzang dang chos gos rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang / de nas chos gos gcig bshang gci dag gis 'bags shing sbrang ma rnams
301b4('dul ba): 'du bar gyur to// de nas gis 'ged pas rim gro byed pa de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis rgyang ngan byas te/ chos gos ma bkrus kyis khrus shig
301b5('dul ba): des smras pa/ yo byad ni khyod 'geng na/ kho bos ba klu 'am/ khyod kyis khrus shig/ skabs de dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bac+doMs

301b7('dul ba): bya'o// dge slong bshes gnyen dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi na/ de rnams kyi yo byad dang / dge tshul gyi yo byad dang / 'tsho bo'i yo byad mang po rgan
301b8('dul ba): po'i mthar spangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nang g.yog gis yo byad drug bkur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to zhes ngas 'dams shing 'jams shing bzang po rnams blangs
302a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang po rnams las sbyin par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
302a2('dul ba): stsal pa/ ngan pa rnams las sbyin par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bar ma dag las sbyin par bya'o// nang pa ma tshor bar dge 'dun gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'du
302a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/ myur ba myur bar brtags par bya'o// de'i bya ba nyams par mi bya ste/ lus kyi gnas skabs
302a4('dul ba): nas gang zag gi gnas mal la bskal bar bya'o// glang gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong nad pa zhig yod pa des lus kyis gnas skabs la brtags nas/ dge slong zhig
302a5('dul ba): smras pa/ re shig kho bo ji tsam 'tsho'i bar du rim gro gyis shig kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni khro za shi nas khyod ci bder gyis shig/ des de'i rim gro bya bar brtsams pa

302a7('dul ba): byed du bcug go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gson po'i tshe nyid na ma
302a8('dul ba): byin na/ shi nas sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdag shi nas 'di'i yino// zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni med pa yin pas blangs te bgos 'dage slong de'i rang gi skal pa sbyin par
302b1('dul ba): bya'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nang tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de shes pa chung bas de'i sman med nas/ de'i lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags te rim gro byed pa

302b4('dul ba): ltung ngo // gal te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i tshe du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas par gyur dang / dad pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur

304a1('dul ba): med na de'i spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin te/ pa'i la bu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong ma
304a2('dul ba): kyis thabs pa sdug bsngal ba/ nang tshabs tsha ba tshor rabs nyen pa zhig yod pa de la lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod/ de de la lhag par chags nas rim gro byed pa la smras pa/ 
304a3('dul ba): bo'i lhung bzed 'on cig/ des ma byin pa dang / de de la ngan sems skyes zhing lhung bzed la lhag par chags pa shi nas/ de lhung bzang de nyid sbrul zhig tu skye so// dge slong rnams kyi

304b1('dul ba): sbar bas na nags de rab tu 'bar te/ de nyid tu tshig nas dge slong rnams la ngan sems skyes pas dmyal ba rnamasu skyeso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la

304b3('dul ba): khros pa'i me dang / dmyal bar sems can dmyal ba'i dang / dur khrod du me phal pas sreg par 'gyur ba thams cad las yid byung bar bya'o// de lta bas na dge slong gis yo
304b4('dul ba): byad la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya zhing / ga nga la skye ba de yongasu spang bar bya'o// ma spangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gal te nad pa

305a1('dul ba): dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong zhig shi nas/ dge slong rnams kyis de phrang sA dur khrad du bzhin du bor nas
305a2('dul ba): lag khang du lhags te/ gos 'gad pas chos gos dang / lhung bzed dgo'o zhes nga'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang / de mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pas/ bug po blangs te sa

305a4('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ dge slong rnams kyis sngar de'i rol mchi dpe byas la/ de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bgos
305a5('dul ba): dang nyes dmigs 'dir mi 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni ma nyan yang na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer/ 
305a6('dul ba): la mchod pa byas bsregs nas/ de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / gos 'ged pas nga'i gnas khang du zhugs pa las/ des dbyug pa blangs te langs nas re shig
305a7('dul ba): bdag gi ched du chos bsgrags par chos rnams 'gad par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba/ 
305a8('dul ba): stsal pa/ de'i ched du chos bsgrags pa dang / de'i tshe du yon sngo ba byas nas/ chos gos rnams bgo bar bya'o// sdom la/ nad pa dang ni tshong dpon dang / dngos po'i sbyin pa lag
305b1('dul ba): gi gla mtshams bzhi dag tu bya ba dang // pho nya brgya du bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim
305b2('dul ba): du gdug chod la spyan drangs pa la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni lhag so// bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes// sangs
305b3('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes te lnga po gang zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhes pa dang
305b4('dul ba): lha rnams la ches 'chad par bzhed pa dang / gnas ma la la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nad po la gzi gas par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab
305b5('dul ba): pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/ skabs 'dir ni nang pa la gzigs pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyis
305b6('dul ba): bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal ba zheso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas/ ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ sde mig
305b7('dul ba): bsnams te kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang / spyil pa nas spyil po dang / 'chags nas 'chags rnams 'chag cing
305b8('dul ba): gshegs pa na/ gtsug lag khang chen po gang na ba der phyin pa dang / de na dag slong nang tshabs che ba shes pa chung ba ring gi gcin dang / ngan skyugs kyi nang du nub pa zhig gis
306a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mthong nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchiso// bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchi so zhes skad ngan bton pa
306a2('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong nga khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rjesu khyod rab tu byung na/ ci'i phyir de skad bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mahA
306a3('dul ba): so/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchi so// zhes du skad 'don/ btsun pa bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' yang rim gro bgyid pa 'ar/ lta ba ma
306a4('dul ba): mchi so// dge slong khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' la rim gro dang blta ba byas pa yod dam/ btsun pa ma mchis lags so// de bas dang khyod gnas
306a5('dul ba): skabs 'di lta bur gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma'o lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te 'ong zhing ri spos kyi ngang ldang
306a6('dul ba): las sa khyer te 'ong bar gyur cig ces 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdza // chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten po'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de
306a7('dul ba): che brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis she so nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis ma tsho chen po mahA
306a8('dul ba): pa nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gser gyi ril pa bkang ste/ ri spos kyi de ldang ba lasas blangs nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te/ 'dug
306b1('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shig dang de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyi phyir rab tu byung ba ma
306b2('dul ba): yin gyi 'on kyang nga'i phyir yi no// gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di sngon ma mthong la/ lha rnams ni gtsang sbrul dge' ba yin pas 'dug shig/ ngas 'di'i rim gro bya'o// de nas bcwas
306b3('dul ba): kyis na bza' chos gos brdzes nas/ phyag 'khor lo dang bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyim pa can bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ skrag pa rnams la dbugs
306b4('dul ba): 'byin par mdzad pas dge slong de bzung ste/ gcin nga/ ngan srugs nas phyung nis mtha' gcig tu ba/ ga ste/ sdug gi tshal pos bzhar nas sa dkar pos dril
306b5('dul ba): bris byas te bkru so// de nas dkyil mo krung 'char ci cug nas/ de'i tshes gos rnams bkrus te phyophyags de lang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa mdza// de nas phyag
306b6('dul ba): dang zhabs bsil nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la nad pa rim gro bya ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bshad pas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin dra bcug nas
306b7('dul ba): gtsug lag khang du zhugaso// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gyi bsod snyoms khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song // chos nyid kyis sangs
306b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms mnos nas khyer te 'ongs pa'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/ dag
307a1('dul ba): slong cig dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam zhes yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas/ bcom lda
307a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ci dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim pa ru byas sam/ btsun pa
307a3('dul ba): bzhin du zhal zas bsod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun legs par tshim par bgyi lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi phreng bzhes te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
307a4('dul ba): bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la gtsug la/ ga khang che ge mo na dge slong nang chabs che ba zhig yo da pa de la bsod snyoms byeng po 'di khyer la zos nas 'di
307a5('dul ba): skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi rim gro ston pa nyid kyis mdzad de bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyi bgo ba sha' yang mdzad zhes gyis shig/ btsun pa bka'
307a6('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyer te/ de la bsod snyoms byin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa
307a7('dul ba): yang smras// 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug pa/ de nas dge slong de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni khams gsum gyi bla ma nyid kyis
307a8('dul ba): rim gri mdzad/ bsod snyoms kyi byed kyang gnang gis bdag dang pas byin pa langs spyod nas laM los dus 'das par byed pa ni/ bdag la rigs pa ma yin pas/ ma la bdag nam
307b1('dul ba): cha stong dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam nas de nam gyi cha stong dang / cha spang la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa na 'kho
307b2('dul ba): ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid du rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos
307b3('dul ba): 'dri zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang
307b4('dul ba): lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems tsan dan dang ste 'ur mnyam pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bral bar gyur cing / rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang
307b5('dul ba): dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyeng pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / da bang po dang / nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
307b6('dul ba): mchod par bya ba dang / brjod par bya ba dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nad pa 'di dag
307b7('dul ba): la ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod po khyed cag kho na ma gtogs par ma med pa med/ rtsa la ge gzhan medo// de lta bas na/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi par
307b8('dul ba): chun du rim gro bya ste/ mkhan pos ni lhan cig gnas pa'i'o// lhan cig gnas pas ni mkhan po'i'o// slob dpon gyis ni nye gnas kyi'o// nye gnas kyis ni slob
308a1('dul ba): dpon gyi'o// mkhan po gcig pas ni mkhan po gcig pa'i'o// slob dpon gcig pas ni/ slob dpon gcig pa'i'o// gtam 'dres pas
308a2('dul ba): gtam 'dres pa'i'o// phebs par smras pas ni phebs par smra ba'i'o// spros 'dren gyis spros 'dren gyi'o// 'khor dang bral ba shes pa chung ba gang yir ba de ni dge 'dun gyis
308a3('dul ba): nad kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas rim gro pa gcig gam gnyis sa maM/ mang po sbyar te mthar na dge 'dun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o// dge slong rnams the tsar thams cad
308a4('dul ba): gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ ba tsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad nas/ des dgra bcom pa mngon sum
308a5('dul ba): du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig/ tu ma zad/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i rim
308a6('dul ba): gri byas nas/ de mngon par shes pa lnga mngon du byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bsti gnas me tog dang 'bras dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa/ shing sa
308a7('dul ba): tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig na/ drang srong mngon pa shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnaso// des slob ma'i rim gro byas nas sos pa dang / de nas des mngon par
308a8('dul ba): pa lnga mngon sum du byas// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin de ni de nyid yi no// drang srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni dge slong
308b1('dul ba): 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas de'i rim gro byaso// da ltar yang byaso// gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lhag par nad pa
308b2('dul ba): rnams la byams par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu mdzade/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga lhag par nad pa
308b3('dul ba): rnams la byams pa byed pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul shi bi pi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal ba'i pho brang na/ rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang bde ba dang
308b4('dul ba): lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ de slong ba pa rnams la mi gtong ba cung zad kyang med/ nad pa rnams la ni khyad
308b5('dul ba): par du byed// ji tsam na khyim bdag nad pa sman pa tha mas cad kyis spangs po zhig rgyal po'i drung du song nas/ lha bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ rgyal pos sman pa
308b6('dul ba): rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag dpyad byos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di'i sman ni dkon lagaso// rgyal pos smras pa/ dkon pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ lha
308b7('dul ba): gang zhig btsas tshun chad sngon lan 'ga' yang su la yang khrom myong ba de'i khrag las nas thug bgyis te/ zla ba drug tu stsal na de lta na 'di smos par 'gyur lags kyi
308b8('dul ba): gzhan gyis ni ma lagaso// rgyal pos smras pa/ de'i sman dkon pa ni bden no// de nas bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par brtsams na/ bdag nyid kyi spyod pa brtag par dka'
309a1('dul ba): par gyur nas// des ma ma madris par brtsams pa/ mam pasu 'di srid kyi bar du sngon 'ga' la khros pa yod dam/ gzhon nu khyod gang gi che ba
309a2('dul ba): spang du byon pa de nas/ bdag kyang sngon sul lan 'ga' yang khro ma myong na/ khyod lta smos kyang ci 'tshal de nas ma'i drung du song nas smras pa/ 
309a3('dul ba): yum bdag dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon su la yang 'ga' yang khros pa mchis sam/ gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe/ bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de nas bdag kyang
309a4('dul ba): sngon su la yang khro ma myong na/ khyod lta smos kyang ci dgis// ngas bsams pa/ sman rnyed do snyam du rig nas sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag ngas rang la brtag
309a5('dul ba): nAng sngon su la yang khrom myong bas/ ngi'i yan lag lnga'i rtsagator cig/ lha bdag cag ni mi phel ba zhig/ gi don du lha'i skul mtshon mi 'dab so// byang chub
309a6('dul ba): sems dpa' rnams ni gzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas/ rgyal po rang nyid kyi rtswa gtar ti/ khrag de zla ba drug tu nyi ma re re zhing de la
309a7('dul ba): thug srung bas sos par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ de na yang nad pa rnams la byams par byed ma
309a8('dul ba): de lce lho gag spos kyang ci dgas/ gzhan yang ga pa'i rgyal po'i bu gzhog phred skams par gyur nas/ rgyal pos sman pa rnams pa bsgre ba/ shes ldan dag gnan nu
309b1('dul ba): dpyad gyis shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bcud thams cad dang mar sgrol cig/ lo bcu gnyis su bcud thams cad sogs na/ 'di'i yang shang shang te'u gyi sha ma rnyed
309b2('dul ba): sman pa rnams kyis bya ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag me long dang / bya gag khyer te/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dang la/ dar sti tshugs te bya gag gi mdun du me long zhig
309b3('dul ba): shig dang / byagag rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong nas 'di bya gag yin snyam ste/ skad phyung ba dang shang shang te'u gis skad thos nas ngo mtshar tsha bas bya gag gi drung du'o
309b4('dul ba): par 'gyur te/ de bzung ba'i thabs ni 'di yi no// de rnams kyi sa de bzhin du byas pa las ji tsam na/ las kyi zhags pas zin pa'i srog chags shang shang te'u thogs nas
309b5('dul ba): de rnams kyi de khyer te song // 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ 'dzi garten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma lon pa 'i tshe dud 'gro rnams kyang smra shes pas srog chag
309b6('dul ba): shang shang te'u gyis smras pa/ bdag gar bkri/ de rnams ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa thong shig/ sha'i mthu yod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sman dang / rin po che rnam
309b7('dul ba): smra'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ re shig khyod kyi sman de dag ci 'dra bar bltas ston cig/ des smras pa/ bdag gis khrus byas pa'i chu ni sha'i mthu yod pa yin gyis/ de khyer la
309b8('dul ba): dang shig/ rin po che ni 'di dag yin// de dag rgyal pos 'jigs pas rin po che rnams bor to shang shang te'u de nyid khyer ti dong pa las rim gyis yul gi ba'i dbyangs kyi rgyal
310a1('dul ba): po'i pho brang du phyin nas/ de rnams kyis srog chags shang shang te'u rgyal po la phul te/ des bstan pa'i sman gang yin pa de yang smraso// de nas rgyal pos
310a2('dul ba): nga shang te'u la dris pa dang / smras pa/ lha bdag bkrus pa'i chab sha stobs can du bgyid pa lag so// rgyal pos chu snod bduni chu bzang pos bkang bar bzhag go// ji tsam na
310a3('dul ba): de dag tu ji srid legs par ngal sos pa de srid khrus byas nas/ de nas lus kyi stobs shes pa dang / maud la 'phur te khang pa'i steng du 'dug nas/ 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba dang
310a4('dul ba): bral te/ tshig su bcad pas smras pa/ re shig thog ma bdag blun te/ phyi nas bya ba 'di dag go/ de nas rgyal po sman pa ste/ blun po'i dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs/ 
310a5('dul ba): shes smras nas song // de nas rgyal pos sman pa rnams pa kug ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag shang shang te'u gyi khrus byis pa'i chu de sha'i mthu yod par byed pa
310a6('dul ba): de bden nam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mang lags kyis mar dang sgrag cig/ de rnams kyis bcud thams cadamar deng bcos te/ rgyal po'i bul grung bzhugs
310a7('dul ba): ji tsam na gangs ri'i sul zhig na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas pa las/ de na gcig gzhogs phyed skams par gyur to// de la rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis smras pa/ 
310a8('dul ba): dang ldan pa ljongasu song la sman pa la smos te sman rten cig dang sos par 'gyur// des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo
310b1('dul ba): mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du chos 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'ong ste/ bdag nad dang bcas te
310b2('dul ba): khyer bar gyur na/ ci'i phyir grong gi mthar 'gro/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de lta mod kyi 'on kyang ji tsam du skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa yun ring du
310b3('dul ba): 'tsho ba de tsam du bsod nams mang po sog so// ji tsam du bsod nams mang po bsags pa de tsam du mtho ris rnamasu yun ring du dga' bar 'gyu ro zhes de de rnams kyis snum
310b4('dul ba): ma btab nas ljongasu babs te/ rim gyis yul shi ba'i de byangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin to// de nas la mgris dub pa ngal sos nasas sman pa'i drung dus
310b5('dul ba): song ste/ bzhin bzangs kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis sman ston cig/ des spros pa 'phags pa khyod kyi snyun nang 'di ci 'dra ba kho na rgyal po'i sras
310b6('dul ba): kyi yang de kho na 'dranas lo bcu gnyis kyis bcud thams cad mar dang bcos par mchis kyis/ gzhung la slongs shig dang / gal te skal ba'i khyad par gyis bcu de thob na/ 
310b7('dul ba): ngas na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// de rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas/ sgo gar bsdad// rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni slong ba pa'i skye bo sman du bzhug pa'i phyir sgo rgyun tu dril 'jam
310b8('dul ba): tegang gi tshe spong ba po sgon 'dug pa de'i tshed de dkrol bar byed// ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nas dril te bkrol to// de nas rgyal po'i bus pa dang ma la smras pa/ yab yum
311a1('dul ba): slong pa zhig mchis kyis ci zhig slong spros shig/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyi su rdzas rnams bsags te/ bcos nas byas
311a2('dul ba): pa'i bcud 'di re shig 'thung shig dang / phyi nas slong ba po nang du bkug la ci spong ba rma'i// de ngo mtshar dang / bkra shis dang / bde legasu gyur pa dag byas nas mar 'thung por
311a3('dul ba): 'dod na/ slong ba po'i skye bo'i rabs lus kyi gan du phog nas/ mer de ma 'thungs par smras pa/ yab yum re shig spong ba po nang du bkug gi bar du ma'i 'tshalo// rgyal pos sgo ba
311a4('dul ba): la bsgo ba/ slong ba po nang du thong shig/ de nang du zhugs pa dang // rgyal po'i bus lus mdzes pa dang / sems dang pa dang / spyod lam zhi bas zhugs pa mthong nas/ des smras
311a5('dul ba): pa 'phags pa ci zhig bzhed/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa bcud ni khyod kho na la 'os kyi/ bdag la ma lags kyi dbul gyi ba'u
311a6('dul ba): shig dnges lhung bzed bzad pa dang / rgyal po'i bu bsam pa drag pos lhung bzed der bcung blugs// bdag nyid chen po des kyang rgyal po'i bu la sems can thams cad
311a7('dul ba): la phan pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam ni 'grub par 'gyur la/ de yang tshul khrims rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyis ka
311a8('dul ba): yangasas par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzhon gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ de na yang ngand pa rnams la byams par byed na/ 
311b1('dul ba): da lta lta smos kyang ci dgos/ btsun pa rgyal bu dang rang sangs rgyas des las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na gnyi ga mnyam du bros thebs la/ mnyam du sos par gyur lags/ 
311b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gnyis kho nas sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams las tshogs bsags pa/ rkyen yongasu sgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar
311b3('dul ba): gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas 'di gnyis kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su log gis so sor myong bar 'gyur
311b4('dul ba): dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur// chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi
311b5('dul ba): 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar lasang ge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la
311b6('dul ba): par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba 'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyeng na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras pa dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong
311b7('dul ba): sngon 'byung ba wa ra na sa'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ del bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de rgyal srad la dga' bar gyur to// ma
311b8('dul ba): na 'dzin la yang bu gnyis yad pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de mdun ni 'dzin 'dod par gyur te/ sems can rnams ni khams kyi sgo nas/ shang 'phrong ba yin pas/ dam
312a1('dul ba): phan tshun du yid btsugs par gyur nas rgyal bus smras pa/ thabs ci zhig byas na des nang rgyal por 'gyur// des smras pa khyod kyis gal te bdag
312a2('dul ba): mdun na 'don du gzhug na ni/ thabs mchis kyis snyan du gsol bar bgyi'o// des smras pa de ltar bya ste/ gzhug gis smros shig/ des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi gcan
312a3('dul ba): bar bgyis dang / khyad rgyal por 'gyuraro// des rje su yi ngo // de nas rgyal bu za tha shes des sman ma yin pa byin nas 'bor gyur to/ dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po shi nas rtswa
312a4('dul ba): po rnams kyis de ni 'a bor gyur to snyam nas/ nu zo shos rgya la por dbang bskur to// des kyang mdun na 'don gyi nu bo shes gang yin pa de mdun na 'don du bcug go/ 
312a5('dul ba): ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dang mdun na 'don lhan cig tu bre mo gau ta ma smra zhing 'dug pa las rgya la pos phu bo zha ba de mthong // des de mthong nas
312a6('dul ba): 'gyod par gyur te/ bdag gis rgyal srid kyi phyir phu bo zhi bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni ma legs pa zhig byas// lha bdag kyang 'gyod par gyur gyis/ gal te lha da
312a7('dul ba): na 'di phyir sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o// des smras pa/ gnong gis byos shig/ des de la sman byin nas sos par gyur to// de nas de gnyis kyis rang sangs rgyas zhig
312a8('dul ba): la bya ba byas nas/ smon lam gdab par brtsams pa gang yang bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pas/ phyug cing na
312b1('dul ba): mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs skye zhing zha bor byas pa'i sdig pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pa yang nyam su mi myong bar gyur cig ces byaso// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ 
312b2('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin// mdun na 'don gyi bu gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas 'di nyid yino// de gnyis kyis gros byas nas/ rgyal bu
312b3('dul ba): gzhonu la sman ma yin pa byin pa des na mnyam du zha bor gyur to// yang 'gyod par gyur pas de gnyis kyis gros byas te/ slar sman byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam
312b4('dul ba): du sos par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la gcig tu dkar ba rnams cigaci
312b5('dul ba): tu dkar ba dang / 'dras ma rnams kyi 'dres ma ste/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang // 'dres ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dka
312b6('dul ba): ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// / glang gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe mnyan yod na/ khyim bdag chod
312b7('dul ba): dpon zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/ yongasu bzung ba/ yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhing
312b8('dul ba): gnaso// des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang / chu lha dang / lus den dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa la
313a1('dul ba): gsol ba 'debs shing / lha'i bye brag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / tshal gyi lha dag dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang / sum mngo
313a2('dul ba): lha dag dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos 'thun pa'i lha dag dang / rtag tu rje su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'dab so// 'jig rten na gang dag
313a3('dul ba): gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las/ bu po dang / bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod// de ni de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar gyur tu zin na/ re re la yang 'di lta ste/ 
313a4('dul ba): dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong stong lo da par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu po dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyu
313a5('dul ba): gsum po de dag gang zhe na/ pa dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtsha na dang ldan pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste
313a6('dul ba): gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu po dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyu ro// des gang gi tshe lha rnams la gsol ba byas kyang bu pho dang bu mo med pa de'i tshe/ lha thams cang
313a7('dul ba): spangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to// ji tsam na dge slong zhig gi drung du song ste/ 'phags pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu
313a8('dul ba): 'byung bar 'tshalo// bzhin bzangs de bzhin du gyis shig ces des de rim gyis skra bregs nas/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams sbyin par brtsams pa las rims chen pos
313b1('dul ba): thebs nas/ rab tu byung ba'i bar cha du gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa shig sos kyi bar
313b2('dul ba): du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mi sbyin zhing de'i rim 'gro bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rim gro bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong rnams kyi sus bya ba ma shes nas/ btsa
313b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams dang sman paso// sman pa rnams nyin par sman byas na/ mtshan mo nang la bab par gyur to// de rnams kyis smras pa
313b4('dul ba): 'phags pa 'di'i spyad bdag cag gis gdugs la bgyis na/ mtshan mo grol bab par gyur gyis gal te 'di khyim du bskul na/ bdag cag gis nyin mtshan
313b5('dul ba): du 'di'i dpyad bgyi'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim du sgrol la ra
313b6('dul ba): yang de'i rim gro byad pa sbyin par bya'o// de'i nang de yun ring por gyur nas/ skra ring po ring por skyes nas/ khyim bdag de khyim bdag mgo rag ces bya bar grag so// de gang gi
313b7('dul ba): rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas pa las/ slar la na bar gyur pa de'i tshe// des bdag ni 'chi'o zhes bya bar rang gi
313b8('dul ba): cha chod nas/ de na ngas 'chi ka'i tshe rang gi nor thams cad glegs bu la bris te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bsku ro// de ni shi'i blon po rnams kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
314a1('dul ba): rgyal la smras pa/ lha khyim bdag mgo rag bu ma mchis par gum ste/ de la dbyig dang / gser dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / bo 6
314a2('dul ba): sogs te phal mo che zhig mchis pa de thams cad glegs bu la bris nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la pu lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa
314a3('dul ba): nye dga' bang ba glegs bu ma bris pa yang ma thob na/ glegs bu la bris pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba gang yin pa de long shig pa'i skabs

314b1('dul ba): spyad dang / rdza mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / shing mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / smyug ma mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / bran po dang bran mo dang las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / kha zas dang

314b7('dul ba): yang rgyal po la 'os pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o// mtshon che rnams ni gzhag la/ de rnams gr-i gu dang / khab dang / khar sal du bsdungs te/ ngas
314b8('dul ba): 'dun la brim par bya'o// tshon rtsi rnams las tshon rtsi chen po gang bkus pa dang / mtshal dang / thing shing la sogs pa de dag ni sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dri gtsang khang du
315a1('dul ba): gzhag par bya'o// zod lo kar dang / bcag dang / rams ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o// chang ni yongs blugs las dong du gzhug par bya ste/ tshar
315a2('dul ba): na longs spyad par bya'o// char ma rung na dor bar bya'o// dge slong dag nga ston pa yin par khas len pa rnams kyi chang mi sbyin zhing tha na rtsa mchog gis kyang mi btung // sman rnams

315a4('dul ba): 'khyil pa la sogs pa ni cha gnyi su byas te/ gcig ni cho sa la'o// gcig shos ni dge 'dun la'o// chos kyi gang yin pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar

315a7('dul ba): bar bya'o// chags rgya ni myur du 'grub par nus pa gang yin pa des ni rdzas 'ged pa'i tshe/ dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs bzhi

315b1('dul ba): gcig ni sangs rgyas la'o// gnyis pa ni chos la'o// gsum pa ni dge 'dun la'o// sangs rgyas kyi gang yin pa des ni dri gtsang khang dang / dbu skra sen mo'i mchod rten rnams kyi

316b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong yang gzhan du gum lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang gzhan na mchis/ dngos po'i sbyin pa

318a7('dul ba): par spyad pa yino// gang gis bskur ba dri la yid btsugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yi no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur ba byed na/ gang la bskur ba
